texts.es: Sandra de estado civil soltera, tiene 2 hijos. La separación de su  ex pareja, la  llevo a tratar de conseguir un empleo. Pues fue ahí donde ella aprendió en un curso de conducción a manejar y por eso que ahora  ella  se convertiría en una mujer taxista ella cuando maneja su carro y coge pasajeros , sus clientes  se sorprende al verla en el volante .ya que  casi por lo general este oficio lo ejercitan más los hombre por eso a ella no le interesa eso pues solo le importa superarse en la vida. Su aspiración a un futuro no muy lejano es comprarse otro carro. Con el préstamo Sandra comprara cosas como: herramientas, repuestos, y pintar su carro etc.
texts.en:
Sandra is single and has two children. Her separation with her ex-partner led her to try to get a job. That's when she took a driving class and learned how to drive, and now she has become a female taxi driver. When she drives her car and picks up passengers, her customers are surprised to see her behind the wheel, given that in general, this position is held more often by men. She doesn't care about that, though; she only cares about bettering herself in life. 

Her aspiration for the near future is to buy another car. With this loan, Sandra will buy things like tools and spare parts, and paint her car, etc.

loans.use: to buy things like tools and spare parts, and to paint her car.

loans.name: Abduholik

texts.en:
Abduholik is an entrepreneurial person who is married and has 2 children. He has been busy with animal husbandry for more than 5 years. Little by little, Abduholik has perfected his knowledge. He sells his animals in the local market and has many customers. Thanks to his animals' good condition, Abduholik has managed to win a large number of customers for his business.

Abduholik is looking for a loan to buy young cattle. He will then be able to offer his customers good animals and continue to make financial progress, providing his household with good earnings.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 53 years old. She is a mixed crop farmer who is widowed with four children. She has been in the farming business for the past seven years with the monthly income of 15,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Lucy will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to expand the farming business by buying another farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, 62 years old, is a mixed crop farmer who is married to Hannah, a farmer. They are blessed with eight children. John has been in the farming business for the past 36 years, earning a monthly income of KES 21,000 which he uses to support his family. 

John is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD, having been introduced by a KADET staff member. John will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer. He will use the anticipated profit from the business to educate his children. John's hope and dream is to expand the farming business by buying another farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Serge Guy

texts.fr: Guy est est un homme de 38 ans. il ouvert un petit cybercafé dans un quartier la capitale qu'il gère depuis 2 ans. le phénomène internet est un phénomène qui est de plus en plus grandissant ce qui se remarque par l'accroissement massif de cyber-café dans la plupart des banlieux. Sa remarque faite du petit nombre de cyber-café présent dans sa banlieue, il voudrait ce crédit pour acheter trois nouveaux ordinateurs d'occasion afin de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. ce qui lui permettra d'augmenter sa clientèle et par conséquent ses bénéfices. Bénéfices qui lui permettront d'une part de réinvestir afin d'agrandir  son cyber-café moderne en achetant plus d'ordinateurs et d'autre part de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Guy is a 38 year old man.  He opened a small cybercafé in a district of the capital which he has been managing for two years.  The internet phenomenon is growing rapidly, which is evident in the boom in cybercafés in most of the suburbs.  He noticed that there were only a few cybercafés in his own district; he would like this new loan in order to buy three more used computers to meet the demand of his customers. This will help him to grow his client base and therefore his profits. These profits will allow him to reinvest in and grow his modern cybercafé by buying more computers, as well as to meet the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy three used computers.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is very industrious and devotes herself to maintaining a good income from her business for her family's sustenance. Jocelyn, 21 years old, has been selling fruits and vegetables to the people in her village for 2 years. She is now asking for PHP 5,000 to invest in her business by buying cabbages, potatoes and eggplant to sell in her food stall. Jocelyn promises to repay her loan and generate a good income from it so that, in the future, she may give a fortunate life to her family.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, potatoes and eggplant to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en: Domingo is from Alcala. He is married and has four children. He is now 33 years old and has managed his transport business for over 10 years. He provides transport services, especially to students in his village. He would like to maintain good services; that is why he would like to ask for 5,000 Philippines pesos  to buy gasoline and tires for maintenance of the motorcycle for the transport business. Additional revenue will be saved for matriculation fees.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and tires for maintenance of the motorcycle.

loans.name: Celly

texts.en: Celly is a hog raiser living in Alcala with her spouse, George, and two children. She is 35 years old. In the hog raising business, she is able to earn P3,000 for each hog disposed. She is asking for P12,000 to buy feed, vaccines and medicines to nourish her hogs. Someday, she hopes to make her small piggery more profitable so she can pay for her children's education. She also promises to pay back her loan in full.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and medicines to nourish her hogs.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en: Joel is 25 years old, married to a housekeeper, and has one child. To sustain his family, he provides motorcycle transport services. He usually earns P200 each day in this business. He is asking for P7,000 to buy tires, crude oil, and gasoline to maintain his motorcycle. He would like to ensure safe travel for all his passengers and thus increase his profit. This will allow him to provide a good education to his child, the only legacy he can pass on.

loans.use: to buy tires, crude oil, and gasoline to maintain his motorcycle.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is a married woman from the town of Cauayan in the province of Isabela. She and her husband are both farmers. They primarily grow and sell rice. Emma does her best to improve their business and take care of their child. Emma is requesting a loan of PHP 35,000 to purchase quality seeds, fertilizer, and other farm inputs. She hopes to have a bigger farm in the future. She also hopes to help improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase quality seeds, fertilizer, and other farm inputs

loans.name: Mulandi

texts.en: Mulandi is a 40-year-old a business man. He is married to Elizabeth, who is a mixed-crop farmer. They are blessed with six children. He has been in a livestock trading business for the past 20 years with the monthly income of KES 5,000. He is applying for his fifth loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. Mulandi will use the loan to buy more goats and sheep. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a pickup for transporting livestock to the nearby market.

loans.use: to buy more goats and sheep.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 32-year-old mixed-crop farmer. He is married to Joyce, a farmer. They are blessed with two children. He has been in the farming business for the past two years with the monthly income of KES 10,000, which he uses to support his family. He is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Peter will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer to use in his farm. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to expand the farming business by buying another farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a 47-year-old mixed-crop farmer. She is married to Peter, a businessman. They are blessed with four children. She has been in the farming business for the past seven years with the monthly income of KES 5,000, which she uses to support her family. She is applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Mary will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for use in her farm. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to expand the farming business by buying another farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Joan Grace

texts.en: Joan Grace is a small entrepreneur from Alcala. She is 25 years old, married and has one child. She has a small store selling grocery items to the people in her village.  She usually generates PHP 300 each day, which pays for meals and sustenance of her child. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy sardines, bread, noodles, and soap to sell. Someday, she hopes to acquire a good income and grow to be a successful entrepreneur for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy sardines, bread, noodles, and soap to sell

loans.name: Sonaxanim

texts.en: Sonaxanim is a 57-year-old mother of four children and married. Sonaxanim and her family live in Agsu, where she and her husband work in a grocery store they opened five years ago. She wants to expand her business. Her plan is to build a store of her own and expand it from a grocery store to a little supermarket. Sonaxanim asked for a loan to increase the goods sold in her store to include food like flour, rice and sugar. With this loan, she will be able to accelerate the process of opening a supermarket of her own.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her store

loans.name: Mirbala

texts.en:
Mirbala is a very courageous man, that is, characterized as someone who can manage tough jobs like raising cattle and agriculture. He's the father of three adult children and has the responsibility of supporting his family and providing them with everything that they need. 

In spite of his difficult economic situation and after much time, he has been able to get ahead in his business through the purchase of cattle to breed them on his property. It's for this reason that Mirbala comes to AqroInvest CU for loans for the purchase of animals so that he may breed them. He has good loan history, and this his third loan. 

He plans to buy four cattle. His greatest goal nowadays is to improve his economic situation and provide a better way of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy four cattle.

loans.name: Rosalin

texts.en:
Rosalin is a helpful mother. She has been operating her small business selling fruits and vegetables for almost three years now. She is now 37 years old, married and has two children attending school. She would like to borrow additional revolving capital of 7,000 Philippine pesos to buy tomatoes, potatoes and cabbages to sell in her vegetable stall. 

Rosalin's goal in life is to provide a good education to her children while extending friendly services to her customers.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes and cabbages to sell in her vegetable stall

loans.name: Manny

texts.en: Manny, 34 years old, is married. His main source of income comes from planting and harvesting rice to sell. He has five years of experience. With his last crop, he earned about PHP 30,000. Now, he is asking for a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and seedlings and pay the labor cost for planting his farm. Future loans from KIVA would be very useful to him, as he sees the loans as the only chance for the growth of his business and financial security.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings and to pay the labor costs for planting

loans.name: Norma  Paula

texts.es: Norma Paula de 54 anos de edad, casada con dos hijos mayores de edad, e independiente económicamente. Ella pertenece al departamento de León, lugar que esta ubicado en la zona de occidente del país, y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística,Ella se desempeña prestando su servicio de lavado y planchado ajeno. El objetivó del prestamos es invertir en mejoras de su vivienda que consisten en levantar un porche en la parte delantera de su casa para  brindar comodidades a su familia. Con el financiamiento comprar material de construcción como: arena, cemento, bloques, cal, hierro, zinc. Norma Paula agradece la ayuda que le brindan a la personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Norma Paula, 54, is married with two grown and financially independent children. She lives in the state of Leon, located in the western region of the country, which is known as a tourist area. She provides laundry and ironing services. 

The goal of the loan is to make improvements to her home that include putting a porch on the front of her house to increase her family's comfort. With this loan she will buy construction material like sand, cement, cinder block, lime, re-bar, and tin roofing. Norma Paula is grateful for the help given to people with few resources and poor countries like Nicaragua.

loans.use: to make home improvements and buy construction materials: sand, cement, cinder block, lime, re-bar, tin roofing.

loans.name: Sara Esmirna

texts.es:
La señora Sara Esmirna es muy trabajadora y emprendedora,  labora diario desde las seis de la mañana hasta las nueve de la noche, los siete días de la semana en su pulpería y tienda de ropa, ubicada en su casa de habitación, su madre le ayuda en el negocio.

 Solicita el  préstamo a nuestra institución para invertir en capital de trabajo, para la  compra de granos básicos, lácteos, perecederos y ropa variada. Esto con el propósito de tener mayor variedad de productos y ofrecer a sus clientes más artículos; con el propósito captar mas compradores. El crédito anterior lo invirtió en su negocio en la compra de productos para su venta.  

Agradece  a  ceprodel y Kiva, por la oportunidad y la confianza depositada en ella, por lo que este crédito lo invertirá en su negocio  de forma que esto le permitirá llevar el sustento a su hogar  e ir mejorando su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Sara Esmira is very hardworking and dedicated. She works daily from 6am to 9pm, seven days a week in her small grocery and clothing store, located in her home. Her mother helps her with the business.

She asks the institution for a loan to invest in capital, purchasing basic grains, dairy products, perishables and a variety of clothing. Her objective is to have a greater variety of products to offer her customers and thereby capture more buyers. The previous loan was invested in her business in the purchase of products for resale.

She thanks Ceprodel and Kiva for the opportunity and trust given to her, because of which she will invest in her business in a way that will allow her to sustain her home and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, dairy products, perishables and various clothing.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is 29 years old. She has ventured into a business of making and selling ropes and is married to Kivuku. They are blessed with four children. She has been a business lady for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 4,000, which she uses to support her family. She is applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Jane will use the loan to buy threads for making ropes. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will put it back into the business. Her hopes and dreams are to educate her children, expand her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy threads for making ropes.

loans.name: Roda

texts.en: Roda is 30 years old, a business lady, and married to Felix, who is a business man. They are blessed with three children. She has been running a butchery business for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 40,000, which she uses to support her family. She is applying for her fourth loan from KADET LTD after paying the previous loan successfully. Roda will use the loan to purchase goats for meat in her butchery business. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children and boost her business. Her hopes and dreams are to have a good business and a happy, healthy family.

loans.use: to purchase goats for meat to sell in her butchery.

loans.name: Stelamaris

texts.en:
Stelamaris is 66 years old and a business lady married to Makau who is a farmer. They are blessed with two children. She has been running a retail shop for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 30,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her fourth loan from KADET LTD after paying the previous loans successfully. Stelamaris will use the loan to buy more stock for her business like sugar, rice and cooking oil. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will open another business. Her hopes and dreams are to educate her children up to university level and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock like sugar, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 33 years old, married and has three children. To generate income, he is providing a motorcycle transport service to the people in his village. From this business, he is able to gain PHP 300 each day. He is not contented with his income because the cost of living today is expensive. All his children are attending school too. He is now borrowing a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy tires, gasoline and crude oil used in the transport business. This will maintain the smooth flow of his operation. 

With a good income from the business, he will give the best education to his children and someday lead them to income stability.

loans.use: to buy tires, gasoline and crude oil for his motorcycle

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
Maria tiene una tienda general desde hace 3 años cuando lo compró a una amiga que lo estaba vendiendo muy barato, y de esta manera encontró una fuente de ingresos que estaba buscando para aportar económicamente en su hogar donde convive con su esposo y sus 6 hijos. Pese a que el negocio lo inició con un muy bajo capital, poco a poco ha podido ir sacando el negocio adelante y así aumentando la variedad de productos que vende a sus clientes; y gracias a que en los últimos días ha venido teniendo buenas ventas, Maria busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar para surtir los productos que se han ido agotando en la tienda.

Su sueño es poder sacar este negocio adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida que tiene su familia. Además, sueña con tener su casa propia para que su esposo y sus 6 hijos tengan un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Maria has had a general store since three years ago when she bought it from a friend who was selling it for a very cheap price.  In this way she found a source of income, which she was looking for in order to contribute financially to her home where she lives with her husband and six children.  Even though the business started with very low capital, little by little she has been able to grow the business and thus increase the variety products that she sells to her customers.  Thanks to sales being good in the last few days, Maria is looking for a loan to buy basic household necessities to supply the products that have been running low in the store. 

Her dream is to be able to make this business successful and to improve her family’s quality of life.  In addition, she dreams of having her own house so that her husband and her six children have a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy basic household necessities to supply the products that have been running low in the store.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en: Michael is a 55-year-old horticulture and banana farmer and married to Phelis. They are blessed with three children. He has been a farmer for the past 10 years with the monthly income of KES 18,000, which he uses to support his family. He is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET client. Michael will use the loan to buy farming materials like fertilizer and manure. With the anticipated profit from the business he will invest to buy a dairy cow and educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to have a big dairy farm and to be able to support his family without stress.

loans.use: to buy farming materials like fertilizer and manure

loans.name: Peruze

texts.en:
Peruze is from a small village in the Khelvachauri district. She is 69 years old and lives with her daughter-in-law and 18-year-old grandson. Peruze is provided with a retirement pension. Her daughter-in-law works as a nurse and gets a monthly income. Peruze’s grandson goes to the local school. The family is involved in the agricultural business. In particular, Peruze owns 0.2 hectares of agricultural land, which is cultivated and different kinds of vegetables are grown. They also have a garden, where they grow fruits and citrus. Peruze picks the fruits and sells them at the local open market. Peruze is a very hardworking person, with a rich experience in her work.

With the requested loan, she plans to purchase a milk cow. This will allow Peruze to receive milk and have a dairy production. She will sell the dairy locally. This will also give her an opportunity to improve her family's living conditions, as well as finance the education of her grandson. Peruze awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Kwekwe

texts.en: Kwekwe is a 57-year-old business lady who sells fruits in Kilifi. She is married. She has been selling fruits for the last two years and she is doing great. This is her fourth loan from KADET LTD. She plans to purchase more oranges, avocados, pineapples, plums, bananas and mangoes for sale. She will use the anticipated profits to add more stock of fruits and repay her loan. She hopes to have a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more oranges, avocados, pineapples, plums, bananas and mangoes to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth Ndunge

texts.en:
Elizabeth is applying for her fourth loan from KADET Ltd after repaying the previous loan successfully. Elizabeth will use this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and a jembe [hoe] for her business. 

She will invest the anticipated profit in her business. Her hopes and dreams are to live a healthy life and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and a jembe [hoe].

loans.name: Thuku

texts.en:
Thuku is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD after repaying his previous loan successfully. He will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.

With the anticipated profits from his farm, he will educate his children. His ambition is to venture into raising pigs and improving his family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Yasmina Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Yasmina es una de las muchas Mujeres emprendedora, que diversifican sus actividades económicas en busca de mejores condiciones y nivel de vida, Yasmina  además de ser maestra de educación primaria de un colegio de la localidad donde vive; también se dedica a la  compra y  venta de granos básicos oportunidad que le brinda la características de la zona que habita, es casada con 1 hijo a su cargo, una de las necesidades importante que tiene es la compra de mercadería para incrementar su inventario de su negocio, el crédito lo utilizara  en la compra de 40 quintales de maíz, por eso decidió visitar las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiada y poder realizar la inversión deseada y de esa manera lograr el objetivo percibido.
texts.en:
Yasmina is one of the many entrepreneurial women who diversifies her economic activities in search of improved conditions and a better quality of life. Besides being a primary school teacher at a school in the town where she lives, Yasmina also buys and sells basic grains -- an opportunity offered by the characteristics of the area where she lives.

She is married with one son in her care. One of the important things she needs is to buy merchandise in order to increase her inventory. She will use this loan to buy 40 quintals of corn. She decided to visit CEPRODEL's office in order to obtain this benefit and to be able to make the desired investment, so that she can achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy 40 quintals of corn

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel, 30, is married to Teresiah, and together they have two children. For the past three years he has operated a motorcycle transport business.

This will be Samuel’s first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to KADET LTD by his neighbor, who is a KADET client. He is applying for a 81,600 KES loan to buy another motorcycle, which will help him expand his business.

Samuel’s ambition is to diversify his work so as to meet all of his family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Tuul

texts.en: Tuul is a 45-year-old tailor who lives with her family in the outer ger (Mongolian housing tent) district of the city. She has been operating a sewing salon business since 2004, so she is a very experienced tailor. She has two sons, and her younger son is a student. With this loan she planned to build an auto garage from blocks since the winter season in Mongolia is very cold -- the temperature hits -40 C. The family owns a car, and they still don’t have a garage.

loans.use: to purchase necessary construction materials to build a garage.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed to sell.

loans.name: Khanh

texts.en:
Khanh was born in 1971. She has two daughters. The older child is a worker. The younger one is studying at high school. Her husband is a utility repairman. Khanh sells pork for a living and earns 3,000,000 dong (VND) per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. 

Khanh has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,066,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,374,000 VND to buy a table and glass cabinet for her meat stall in the market. She will use the benefits to pay for her daughter’s education fees.

loans.use: to buy a table and glass cabinet for her meat stall in the market.

loans.name: Mumin

texts.ru: Мумин очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 10 лет он занимается пчеловодством и старается всегда быть успешным в бизнесе. Он присматривает за пчелами дома, и полученный мед продает на местном рынке. Он справляется с бизнесом один. Его жена работает учительницей в средней школе. Они имеют 2 детей. Детям 28 и 30 лет. Мумин хочет развивать бизнес, а для этого он должен купить дополнительный мед для расширения капитала своего бизнеса. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки меда. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mumin is a very hardworking and honest man. He has been working as a beekeeper for over ten years, and he always tries to achieve success.  

He takes care of his bees at home and sells the honey they produce at the local market.  He works alone.  His wife is a teacher in a secondary school and they have two children, ages 28 and 30.  

Mumin wants to boost his business, but in order to do this, he needs to buy additional honey to increase his business capital.  

He is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD for the purchase of honey.  He is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy honey for resale.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is 24 years old. He is single but he takes care of one 3-year-old child of his relative who passed away. He sells different merchandise and has been in the business for the past three years. He wants the loan to buy more sugar, maize and salt for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more salt, sugar and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Gabriela Alexandra

texts.es: Gabriela de estado civil casada, tiene 2 hijos, ella y el esposo trabaja en una chifleria ellos  se dieron cuenta que el negocio era rentable el sueño de Gabriela es arreglar su casa y  que su negocio crezca .Con el préstamo ellos compraran materiales  como: plátanos, manteca , gas
texts.en: Gabriela, who is married, has two children. She and her husband work in their plantain chips business. They were aware that the business was profitable. Gabriela’s dream is to fix up her house and that her business will grow. She will use the loan to purchase materials such as plantains, butter and a gas cooker.

loans.use: to buy plantains, butter and a gas cooker.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies and raw materials for the production of candied peanuts and yogurt.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 25 years old and single. He supports his schooling siblings. He operates a milk bar and has been in the business for the past one year.

This is his first term business loan. He was introduced to KADET by his friend, who is a KADET client. He will use the loan to purchase more milk for sale. 

He hopes to purchase a truck that will aid him in transporting milk.

loans.use: to boost his milk business by purchasing more milk for sale.

loans.name: Pati

texts.en:
Pati is from a small village in Khelvachauri district. She is 64 years old and lives with her husband, Vano. Pati and Vano are provided with a retirement pension. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, Pati owns 0.6 hectares of agricultural land, which is cultivated for growing different kinds of vegetables. They also have a garden, where they grow fruits and citrus. Pati picks the fruits and vegetables and sells them at the local open market. The family owns a vineyard as well and produces wine. Pati is a very hardworking person, with a rich experience in her work.

With the requested loan she plans to purchase a milk cow. This will allow Pati to receive milk and produce dairy products. She will sell the dairy products locally, and this will give her an opportunity to improve her family's living conditions. Pati awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy energy saver bulbs to sell for profit

loans.name: Burenjargal

texts.en:
Burenjargal is 26 years old, married, and has two children who attend school.  She lives in a small house with her family in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her spouse is self-employed. 

Burenjargal has worked at a few popular beauty salons in the city for three years. She operates the same salon mentioned in her previous loan and supports her family with it. Head massages, facial treatments, and eyebrow tattoos are the main services offered at her salon. 

Burenjargal is requesting a loan for 1,200,000 MNT which she will use to purchase construction materials to renovate her house's fence which has become old and unsafe. "If I will finish this renovating work, I will very cozy and safe," she said.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to renovate her house's fence.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. John will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. 
With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to venture into pig-rearing, which will improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh was born in 1975. She has two sons and her younger son is a secondary school’s pupil. Minh and her husband have been carpenters for 12 years. They are training their older son carpentry skills at home. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy tools and equipment for doing carpentry. She wants to open a carpentry workshop with modern tools and equipment.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for doing carpentry.

loans.name: Diep

texts.en:
Diep was born in 1982. She has two children who are learning at primary school. Diep and her husband have been carpenters for six years. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In this first loan cycle, she would like to borrow 5,014,000 VND to buy paring chisel tools to do carpentry. She always wants her children go to school for higher education.

loans.use: to buy paring chisel tools to do carpentry.

loans.name: Rosa Indelira

texts.es: Rosa tiene 57 años, tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad. Ella es comercializa  ropa y  sabanas. Todo comenzó cuando la hermana de Rosa que vive en el extranjero le  mando ropa para ella, pero por la ver  necesidad que tenía en ese momento con su situación económica tuvo que venderla. Entonces vio que le generaba mucha ganancia. Y después ella mismo compraba ropa y vendía a sus amistades. Ella trabaja todo el día, sus amigas la buscan para que le venda ropa pero lo que ella quisiera es tener más capital para así poder comprar mucha ropa y sabanas que es lo que más vende en la actualidad. Con el préstamo ella quisiera comprar cosas para que su negocio crezca como: sabanas , camisas , pantalones etc.
texts.en:
Rosa is 57 years old and has two adult children. She sells clothing and sheets. It all began when her sister, who lives abroad, sent her clothes as a gift, however because of her pressing financial situation at that moment, she had to sell them. Then she saw that she made a good profit. Later, she, herself began buying clothes and selling them to friends and acquaintances. 

Rosa works all day and her friends seek her out to buy clothing from her. However, she would like to have more capital so that she can buy a large volume of clothes and bedding, which is what she currently sells most of. With the loan, she would like to purchase items, such as sheets, shirts, pants, etc. so her business will grow

loans.use: to buy sheets, shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 36 years old, from Olkalou, is married and has three children, ages 11, 8 and 3.

Samuel has been a farmer for the past four years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy fertilizer and seedlings to use on his farm.

He hopes to buy a lorry in the near future to use in transporting the farm produce.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru: Хабибе  36 лет. Она замужем на прекрасного человека, которого зовут Абдухалил. Абухалил работает в фермерской хозяйстве. Его зарплата не хватает для содержания жены и 2 детей. Хабиба решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью 5 месяцев назад она начала свой бизнес. Она хочет купить скот для расширения нового бизнеса, но она не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки скота. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Habiba is 36 years old and married to a fine man named Abduhalil who works in the farming business.  Abduhalil's salary is not sufficient to support his wife and two children.

To ensure the welfare of her family, Habiba has decided to help her husband and she has started her own business five months ago.  She wants to buy livestock to boost this new business, but she doesn't have the necessary means to do so.

She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy livestock.  She is planning to use her earnings to provide her children with a good education and a high calorie diet.

She is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to establish a new business.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana, tiene 29 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora, es soltera pero es madre de 2 hijos pequeños a quienes cría con mucho amor, vive junto a ellos en la casa de sus padres y es ahí donde se esfuerza todos los días por dar lo mejor de sí misma para salir adelante. El trabajo de Diana, consiste en la venta de golosinas, su puesto está ubicado en la casa de sus padres, es muy concurrido por sus clientes, ya que está muy bien situada en su barrio, ella es muy conocida por su buen humor y carisma, lo cual ha hecho que sus ventas le den los ingresos económicos que requiere, en ocasiones trabaja por las calles de ciudad o en fiestas o eventos especiales en donde hay mayor afluencia de público. La necesidad de ser independiente y los gastos familiares que ha diario tenía que cubrir fueron los motivos principales que le llevaron a desarrollar éste trabajo, lleva ya 4 años en ésta actividad, al principio sentía que era muy tímida para hacerlo pero con el tiempo pudo desarrollar sus cualidades y ahora vende mucho y está muy contenta por eso. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos reír, considera que lo más difícil es tener que vender bajo los fuertes rayos solares de la mañana, le encantaría tener una tienda de golosinas donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad y poder ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. Este es el crédito numero 2 con MFP, por ello se siente agradecida con las personas que le brindan el financiamiento que necesita para que pueda concretar sus planes, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y espera continuar trabajando con su banco comunal por el compañerismo y la solidaridad que muestran entre ellos cada uno de sus integrantes.
Con el monto solicitado (S/. 1000), comprará mayor cantidad de golosinas para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de empezar a implementar su puesto con algunos abarrotes.
texts.en:
Diana, 29 years old, is a good, friendly and very hard working woman. She is single but is the mother of two small children who she is raising with a great deal of love. She lives with her children in her parents' house, the same place where she strives every day to give the best of herself in order to get ahead. Diana's work is selling candies. Her stand is located in her parents' house, which stays very busy with her customers because it is very well situated in her neighborhood. Diana is very well known for her good humor and charisma, and her sales bring in the income she needs. At times, she works in the streets of the city or at festivals or special events where there is a great influx of people.

Diana was motivated to develop this business by her need to be independent and by the daily expenses she needed to cover for her family. She has now been in this line of work for four years. She felt very nervous at the beginning, but with time she was able to develop her best qualities and now she sells a great deal and is very happy about it. What she most enjoys about her job is talking to her customers and making them laugh. She considers the most difficult part to be selling under the hot morning sun. Diana would love to have an actual candy store where she could sell with greater comfort and be able to offer her customers a wider variety of products.

This is her second loan through Microfinanzas Prisma. She feels very grateful to the people who are offering her the financing she needs to be able to cement her plans. She also promises to comply with her repayments in a punctual manner and she hopes to continue working with her communal bank because of the fellowship and solidarity shown by all of its members.

With the requested amount of 1,000 nuevos soles, Diana will buy a greater quantity of candy to offer her customers and she will also start to add other grocery items to her stand.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of candies and to start selling other grocery items

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome has been operating her grocery business in Nakuru town for the past 14 years. She is 48 years old and a single mother of two children. She also supports two of her grandchildren.

This is her second loan term from KADET LTD. She plans to use the amount to buy more stock of fruits for sale. She also plans to buy more spices, like garlic and French beans. With the anticipated income she plans to open a retail shop.

In the future, Salome hopes to buy a plot and build a house for her family, as well as rental houses.

loans.use: to buy more stock: fruits and spices.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 32 years old. She is a single mother of two children. She sells vegetables and fruits and has been in the business for the past 13 years.

This is her first term loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan to purchase more stock of vegetables and fruits for sale in her business.

She hopes to meet all her family needs as she is the sole breadwinner in her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of vegetables and fruits for sale.

loans.name: Dam

texts.en:
Dam was born in 1964. She has two children, who are adults and have their own families. Dam and her husband sell fish to earn a living. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,066,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy an aeration machine for a water tank to raise her fish in. She wants to use the income to buy a washing machine and a refrigerator for her little house.

loans.use: to buy an aeration machine for a water tank to raise her fish in.

loans.name: Madeleine

texts.fr: Madeleine est une femme de 59 mariée, mère de famille. Elle exerce une activité de commerce en détail où elle vend des vivres  secs (maïs et haricot) dans un marché de la place. Elle aimerait agrandir son activité en achetant plus de marchandises(15 sacs de maPis et du haricot), ça lui évitera les ruptures de stocks qu'elle a tout le temps. ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle déjà grandissante, mais aussi d'augmenter ses bénéfices. Bénéfices qui lui permettront de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille nombreuse dont elle a la charge en partie et avec le temps, d'agrandir son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a 59-year-old woman who is married and has a family.  She works as a retailer and sells dry goods (maize and beans) at a local market.

She would like to boost her activity and buy more goods (she wants to buy 15 bags of maize and beans).  This would prevent her from being constantly out-of-stock.

This loan will not only allow her to meet the needs of an already increasing number of customers, but will also help her to boost her profits.  

Madeleine will use these profits to meet the needs of her large family, whom she helps support.  In the long run, she will also use them to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy 15 bags of maize and beans.

loans.name: Khishigjargal

texts.en: Khishigjargal is 45 years old. She has three children and lives with her son and daughter in Mongolia. She is an astrologer, but from 2002 to 2005, she worked as a seller for a diamond and jewelry shop. She studied in secondary school from 1975 to 1985. Now she works as a astrologer at Gandan (the state monastery) of the city. Furthermore, she plans to operate a grocery store in her city beside her current work. She has much business experience, so she believes that she will have many customers. She is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to use to operate a small grocery store.

loans.use: to start to operate a grocery store.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter used his previous loan to buy more stock of goods to sell in his shop. He bought handbags, and it has been profitable. He was able to pay the entire loan amount in good time.
This is his second loan and he plans to use it to buy more stock of school bags as well as sandals. Due to high demand, he anticipates to make more profits with which he plans to grow his business. Peter also plans to buy a motorcycle to transport his business goods within the town of Nakuru.

loans.use: to buy more handbags to sell.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.fr: Elisabeth est t une femme de 37 , mère de famille. Elle exerce une activité de commerce en détail où elle vend les oeufs en gros et en détail  dans un marché de la place. Elle aimerait agrandir son activité en achetant les  en grande quantité (55 alvéoles d'oeufs), çalui évitera les ruptures de stocks qu'elle a tout le temps. ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle déjà grandissante, mais aussi d'augmenter ses bénéfices. Bénéfices qui lui permettront de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille nombreuse dont elle a la charge et avec le temps, d'agrandir son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Elisabeth is 37 years old, and the mother of a family. She has a retail business which involves selling eggs - both retail and wholesale - in a local market. She would like to grow her business by buying eggs in large quantities (55 trays of eggs), which will overcome her constant problem of being out of stock. This loan will allow her both to meet the needs of her growing customer base, and also to increase her profits.
These profits will help her to meet the needs of her large family, who depend on her, and also in time to grow her working capital.

loans.use: to buy 55 trays of eggs.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.en:
Ismael is 34 years old, married to Doris and blessed with two school going children. He sells clothes, a business he started five years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 25,000.

He has requested his first loan of KES 30,000 from KADET LTD, to purchase bales of jeans, trousers and ladies blouses for sale, especially in the coming festive season.

The anticipated profit will contribute towards his buying a piece of land for his own development. His dream is to become a successful businessman.

loans.use: To purchase bales of jeans, trousers and ladies blouses to sell.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 22 years old, single and with no dependants. He sells cereals, a business he ventured into five years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 50,000. 

He has requested a first loan of KES 9,000 to buy a bag of beans and a bag of green grams (mung beans) to sell. The anticipated profit will be ploughed back to his business. His dream is to become a successful businessman.

loans.use: To purchase a bag of beans and a bag of green gram to sell.

loans.name: Linah

texts.en:
Linah is a 30-year-old single mother of one seven-year-old child. She runs a retail shop, a business she started four years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She has requested for a first loan of KES 25,000 to purchase bales of flour, boxes of biscuits, bar soaps and washing detergents. 

The profit she earns will help her invest into other lines of business. She hopes for a brighter future and a prosperous business.

loans.use: To purchase bales of flour, boxes of biscuits, bar soaps and washing detergents.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Ms Nasreen is a 49-year-old widow. After the death of her husband, she had a very difficult time. She decided not to re-marry and started her own embroidery business in her house to ensure a better future for her children. Being a single parent of four children she is responsible for providing them with the basic necessities of life. One of her daughter also assists in this business. Nasreen is very famous in her community as her embroidery patterns are very popular among her customers.  

However these days she is facing problems in completing the orders of customers on time so she needs to buy additional raw material. For this she requested a loan of Rs 40,000 to buy threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequences and pearls to do embellishment. She is hopeful that she will earn more by serving more customers consistently. She desires to utilize part of the profits to improve her house.

loans.use: To buy threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequences and pearls to do embellishment.

loans.name: Zubaida

texts.en:
Ms Zubaida is a 45-year-old married woman. She is a mother of four. Her husband works in a small factory and earns insufficient income to meet the basic necessities of his family alone. This compelled her to initiate her own business. She started selling corn in her community to contribute to her family's income. Her two sons also assist her by buying a great amount of corn from the market.

She needs to earn more to cover her family's everyday expenditures. For this she needs to target more customers by selling it to far-flung areas of her town. She has gradually improved her business through the support of Kashf foundation. Now she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy a stock of corn from the market and one more cart for her son who will use it to sell in distant areas. She wishes to use the earned revenue on the betterment of her family.

loans.use: To buy a stock of corn from the market and one more cart for her son to use when selling in distant areas.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius has been rearing pigs for the past two years, earning a monthly income of KES 12,000 to support his family.

Julius is applying for his third loan term from KADET Ltd. after repaying the previous loans successfully. He will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for use in his farm and also to buy pig feed.

With the anticipated profit from the business, he hopes to start exporting pig products, which will increase his profits and help him to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for use in his farm and also to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 26 years old. He is from Nakuru and is married with a child who is one and a half years old. 

Samuel has a motorcycle business which he has been running for the past three years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET Ltd. to enable him buy another motorcycle.

He hopes to be able to build rental houses in the near future and be able to cater for his family's needs well in the near future.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Ms Zahida is an energetic female who has been running a beauty parlor for the past 12 years in the town of Ali Pur Chatha. Her family consists of four members including one child, her husband and father-in-law. Zahida works for the improvement of her family’s life style and contributes a lot to the family income by supporting her child’s education and fulfilling family needs. She is very famous in her street and has a good client list. 

Recently she faced cash problems in purchasing items for her beauty parlor. So she decided to get a loan from Kashf Foundation upon the suggestion of her neighbor. She requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy more cosmetic items, a steamer and a dryer to facilitate customers time after time. She is hopeful that she will earn more income as her clients are increasing day-by-day. She wishes to utilize part of the revenue on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: Tto buy more cosmetic items, a steamer and a dryer to facilitate customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dressed chicken to resell.

loans.name: Dukundane I V Group

texts.fr:
Clémentine fait partie du groupe Kundane IV  et  habite à  Cibitoke. Elle a 25 ans et est mariée à Edouard,  un  planton. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants, le cadet a 1an et l'âiné 3 ans.

Elle est  commerçante de haricot  depuis   7 ans. 

C’est  son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de haricot, à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait être fournisseur de haricot dans l’un des marchés de Cibitoke (marché central de Nyeshenza).Elle voudrait en outre voir ses enfants étudier et vivre aisément.
texts.en: Clémentine is a member of the Kundane IV group and lives in Cibitoke. She is 25 years old and married to Edouard, an academician. The couple have 2 children together, the youngest of whom is 1 year old and the eldest of whom is 3. She has been selling beans for 7 years. This will be her first loan from Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and allow her to buy a large quantity of beans for resale, so that she can earn more. In the coming years, she would like to supply beans at one of the Cibitoke markets (the central market of Nyeshenza). She would also like to see her children get an education and live comfortably.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of beans for resale.

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Kyrey está en el quinto ciclo, ellas se unieron con la esperanza de tener un mejor futuro para sus familias y de esa forma darle a sus hijos un futuro digno y sin privaciones.
Una historia es la de la Sr. Justina quien se dedica a la venta de sábanas y ropa, esto gracias al  créditos que se le otorgó, nos comenta que mediante la ayuda de su grupo pudo mejorar su actividad y su nivel de vida e ingreso económico. Ella nos comenta que mediante este negocio la economía de la familia mejoró.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de sabanas y prendas para la venta, para que de esa forma siga cumpliendo con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Kuña Kyrey committee is now in the fifth cycle. They got together hoping to have a better future for their families and in that way to be able to give their children a decent future without deprivations.

One story is Mrs. Justina's. She sells sheets and clothing, thanks to the loan she was granted. She mentions that through her group's help she could improve her business and her quality of life and economic income. She mentions that through this business, her family's economy improved.

She requests this loan in order to buy sheets and garments for sale, and in this way continue satifying her customers.

loans.use: to buy sheets and garments for sale.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
Dina, de 31 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, es madre soltera de un niño de 3 años, vive en la casa de sus padres ya que se encarga de atenderlos y cuidarlos junto a su pequeño hijo, todos los días se esfuerza por ser mejor y salir adelante. El trabajo de Dina consiste en la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, tiene gran variedad de productos en stock que fue acumulando en varias campañas de ventas y que ella las puede obtener a precios cómodos para luego venderlos pudiendo percibir muy buenas ganancias por tales ventas. Ofrece sus compañeros de trabajo entre sus amigos, familiares y compañeros de trabajo ya que también trabaja en un hospital. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para sus demás actividades además de generarle buenos ingresos, espera poder mantener ese ritmo ya que su horario de trabajo le permite organizarse y puede así visitar a más clientes. Este es el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, por ello agradece a las personas que hacen posible su crédito y le dan la oportunidad de continuar trabajando para lograr sus objetivos, está comprometida al pago puntual de sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad. 
Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará cosméticos conformado por perfumes, talcos, desodorantes, cremas faciales, cremas de mano, entre otros. De esta forma espera hacer crecer su negocio ofreciendo variedad e innovación de productos.
texts.en:
Dina, 31 years old, is a very joyful and hard-working woman. She is a single mother with a 3-year-old son. She lives at her parents' house, because she takes care of them, together with her small son. Every day, she makes efforts to be better and progress.

Dina's work consists of selling beauty products through catalogs. She has a great variety of products in stock, which she has been accumulating through different sales campaigns and that she can acquire at a very good price and then sell them, getting a good profit for these sales.

She offers her products to friends, relatives and colleagues, because she also works in a hospital. What she likes about her job is that it allows her to devote time to the other activities that she has, besides being a good source of income. She hopes to be able to keep this pace, because her working schedule allows her to be organized and in that way to be able to visit more customers.

This is the fourth loan with the MFP institution. This is why she is thankful to the people that make her loan possible and give her the opportunity to continue working in order to meet her goals. She is committed to pay the installments responsibly and in time.

With the requested amount - 2000 soles [PEN] - she will buy cosmetics, such as perfumes, talcum powders, deodorants, facial creams, hand creams, among other things. In this way, she hopes to see her business grow, offering variety and innovative products.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, talcum powders, facial creams, hand creams.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Don Francisco tiene 56 años de edad, es casado, tiene 6 hijos todos mayores de edad, que son independientes a él. Nos cuenta que hace más de 10 años se dedica a esta actividad, pudo comenzar su actividad gracias al apoyo de familiares. Con la ayuda de sus hijos y esposa su despensa fue creciendo. En la actualidad se dedica al faenamiento de vacunos y cerdos generándole muy buenas ganancias.
El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de un congelador, ya que necesita conservar mejor sus carnes, para así brindar mejor calidad y comodidad a sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo, ya que de esa forma podrá mejorar sus condiciones de trabajo e ir progresando.
texts.en:
Francisco is 56 years old. He is married and has 6 grown children who are independent. He tells us that he has done this activity for more than 10 years. He was able to start thanks to his family's support. With his wife and children's help his store grew. Right now he works in butchering beef and pigs and it is generating very good income for him. 

The loan he is asking for is to buy a freezer, since he needs to keep his meat better and offer more quality and comfort to his customers. He is grateful for the opportunity he is receiving, since this way he can improve his work conditions and keep progressing.

loans.use: to buy a freezer to keep meat products.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Esperanza, de 42 años, es una mujer alegre y muy sociable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 19 y 13 años quienes aun dependen de ella para su educación y su alimentación, ella vive en su casa propia junto a sus hijos y su pareja con quien trabaja arduamente para darles lo mejor a sus hijos. El trabajo de Esperanza consiste en la realización de manicure y pedicure (arreglo de las uñas de las manos y los pies) además ella también hace peinados, cortes, tintes, rayitos, etc, tiene su local que comparte con su hermana en casa de su mamá, lleva haciendo este trabajo ya por 9 años y lo hace sola ya que la otra mitad del local lo emplea su hermana para otro negocio. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene libertad en cuanto al tiempo que emplea en su faena, tiene clientes antiguos que saben que hace un buen trabajo y por lo tanto vuelven cada cierto tiempo para que les arregle las uñas y puedan seguir mostrándolas lindas, sanas y en buen estado, espera mas adelante implementar con mas accesorios y hacer otro tipo de trabajos. Este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, está muy emocionada y agradecida por el respaldo económico que le ofrecen para continuar con sus planes, no quiere dejar de pagarlo por falta de dinero y es por eso que se compromete a ser muy puntual y sobre todo muy responsable, está muy contenta de continuar con este grupo ya que son muy cumplidos y amables. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará materiales y accesorios como esmaltes de diversos colores, brochas, pinceles, pinzas, mandiles, gorros de peluquería y otros detalles para que así pueda continuar brindando un buen servicio a sus fieles clientes.
texts.en: Esperanza is 42 years old. She is a cheerful and very sociable woman. She lives with her spouse whith whom she has two children, aged 19 and 13. They still depend on her for their education and food. She lives in her own home with her children and spouse, with whom she works hard to give her children the best. Esperanza's work consists of doing manicures and pedicures. She also does hair styling, cuts, coloring, highlights, etc. She has a locale that she shares with her sister at their mother's house. She has been doing this job for 9 years and she works alone since the other half of the locale is used by her sister for her business. What she likes about her job is that she has the freedom to decide how much time she will dedicate to her job. She has long-time customers who know that she does a good job and so they go back to her regularly so she can do their nails and keep looking pretty, healthy and presentable. She hopes in the future she can have more accesories and do other types of work. This is loan number 3 with MFP. She is very excited and grateful for the financial support offered for her to continue with her plans. She doesn't want to stop paying for lack of money and that is why she is committed to making her payments on time and being responsible. She is very happy to continue with htis group since they are very responsible and kind. With the amount of 1500 soles that she has asked for, she will buy materials and accesories such as different colors of nail polish, brushes, makeup brushes, aprons, hair caps and other items so that she can keep offering her faithful customers a good service.

loans.use: to buy materials and accesories such as different colors of nail polish, brushes, makeup brushes, tweezers, aprons, and hair caps.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza, es una mujer de 41 años, se caracteriza por ser amable, honesta y muy trabajadora, es soltera y madres de 2 hijos, vive en una casa alquilada en donde lucha día a día para salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia ya que es por ellos por quienes se sacrifica para salir adelante. El trabajo de Maritza consiste en la confección, arreglo y venta de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, ella se encarga de diseñar sus propios modelos y ofrecerlos a la venta en su pequeño local, aunque algunas veces vende algunas que compra de otras ciudades al por mayor, su público confía en ella ya que su paciencia y su pasión por cada uno de los detalles hace que su trabajo sea de calidad. Trabaja realizando este trabajo por más de 25 años y siempre lo ha hecho sola, además tiene habilidades para la peluquería y es por eso que ha acondicionado un pequeño espacio dentro de su casa para el corte de cabellos y realizar diversos peinados. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, aunque algunas veces ha sentido que no podía continuar porque pensaba que no podía crear algún diseño, por eso empezó a tomar cursos de capacitación en moda y eso le ayudó a crear nuevas prendas, con el tiempo pudo superar éste temor y ahora es una excelente costura, espera mas adelante establecer un taller de costura y ser reconocida en todo el País. Este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado (S/. 1000), comprará hilos y telas para continuar con su trabajo de costura, también comprará prendas de vestir para venderlos en la temporada de verano.
texts.en: Maritza is a 41 year old woman. She is described as being kind, honest and very hardworking. She in single and the mother of 2 children. She lives in a rented house where she fights to get ahead day to day and improve her family's quality of life. They are the reason she sacrifices to get ahead. Maritza's job is sewing, fixing and selling clothing for women, men and children. She designs her own patterns and offers them for sale in her little locale. although sometimes she sells some that she buy wholesale in another city. Her customer's trust her because of  her patience and passion for each detail so that her work will be quality. She has done this work for 25 years and she always works alone. She also has skills in hairstyling and that is why she has set up a small space in her house to do haircuts and different stylings. She really likes her work, although sometimes she has thoughth that she couldn't go on because she couldn't create some design. That is why she started to take trainings in fashion and this helped her create new clothing. Over time she was able to get over her fear and now she an excellent seamstress. She hopes in the future to open a workshop and be known throughout the country. This is loan number 8 with MFP. She is grateful to everyone who has made her loan possible so she can continue doing her work with better results. That is why she is committed once more to making her payments on time as she did with her previous loans. She is also happy to be a part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible people and very supportive. With the amount she has asked for (S/. 1000), she will buy thread and fabric to continue her work sewing clothes. She will also buy clothing to sell for the summer season.

loans.use: to buy threads and fabric to continue her work in sewing. She wil lalso buy clothing to sell during the summer season.

loans.name: Kim

texts.en: Kim was born in 1962. She has two children who are learning carpentry. Her husband is a policeman. His income is about 2,000,000 VND per month. Kim is an iron worker. She gains from it 6,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In this first loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy a wood sawing machine to support her children’s carpentry learning. She always wants to let her children have a good carpentry studying experience so they can get a job in the future. She also wants to buy some more furniture in her little house.

loans.use: to buy a wood sawing machine to support her children’s carpentry learning.

loans.name: Rael

texts.en: Rael is 40 years old. She is married to a teacher, and together they have two children. She is a tailor and has been in the business for the past 13 years. This will be her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan amount to purchase clothing fabric for use in her business. She hopes to purchase more sewing machines and employ people in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase clothing material

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anastasia

texts.en:
Anastasia is from the small village of Dighomi. She is 50 years old and lives with her husband and 12-year-old daughter. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they run a small dairy farm with a milk cow, whose milk is used for dairy production. Anastasia produces cheese products and sells them on the local open market. In addition, the family owns a greenhouse, where different kind of vegetables and greens are grown. They do all relevant agricultural works to ensure a good harvest. The harvested production is sold locally.

She requested a loan to purchase food for cattle. With this credit, she will purchase hay, which will be used to feed the cow during the fall and winter seasons. Since the cow will be fed properly in winter, Anastasia will be able to receive a planned amount of milk and produce dairy products. This will increase the income of the family. The increased income will be reinvested in the family's agricultural activities.

loans.use: to purchase food for cattle.

loans.name: Mourice

texts.en:
Mourice is 38 years old. He is married to Vivian and they are blessed with two children aged 10 and seven. He is a carpenter, a business he started three years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 7,000. 

He has requested a first loan of KES 15,000 to purchase timber for use in his workshop. The profit he makes will help boost this business. 

He dreams of one day venturing into wheat and maize farming.

loans.use: To purchase timber for use in his carpentry shop.

loans.name: 12 De Junio Group

texts.es:
Este Comité actualmente tiene 15 mujeres quienes forman parte del Comité, ellas son  trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los días. Las mismas son independientes en sus labores, pero también trabajan juntas para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Miryan es una de estas mujeres, quien se dedica a la venta de lencería de hombres y mujeres, cuenta que gracias a la buena calidad de sus prendas se formo una buena clientela que siempre compra de ella y gracias a esto esta ganándose la vida dignamente y ayuda a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de lencería, tanto para hombres como para mujeres y de esa forma tener una buena variedad de prendas que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group currently has 15 members who are women. They are hard-working and humble women who earn their means of support every day. These women are independent in their work but they also work together in order to help each other. 
Miryan is one of these women. She sells underwear for men and women. Thanks to good quality products, she has a good base of customers who always buy products from her. Thanks to this, she earns a living with dignity and she helps her family. 
She is requesting a loan to purchase underwear for men and women. With this purchase, she will have a great variety of undergarments to offer to her customers.

loans.use: purchase undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es: Melita, de 42 años, es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora y muy trabajadora, está soltera pero es madre de un hijo de 14 años quien depende de ella para su educación y alimentación, es por él que ella se esfuerza cada día para darle una mejor calidad de vida, ella vive en su casa propia junto a sus hermanos y su papá. El trabajo de Melita consiste principalmente en el transporte de pasajeros, ella se levanta muy temprano para conducir su mototaxi por las calles de la ciudad en busca de aquellas personas que requieren transportarse de un lugar a otro, lleva ya 16 años en este trabajo que le permitió darle educación y alimentación a su hijo, además de permitirle progresar económicamente. Adicionalmente tiene un lavadero de vehículos instalado en su casa y complementa esta actividad con la venta de diferentes lubricantes y accesorios de motos y mototaxis. Afortunadamente sus ingresos económicos siguen multiplicándose y eso le da la tranquilidad que necesita para continuar trabajando día a día. Trabaja con la ayuda de su hermano y de su padre. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que organiza su tiempo como ella lo considere ya que nadie le impone un horario de trabajo y de esta forma puede estar pendiente de todas sus actividades y verificar su adecuado funcionamiento, le está yendo bien en todo y espera poder mantenerse así hasta que  considere que tenga que realizar nuevas funciones. Este es el crédito número 11 con MFP, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su acceso a este financiamiento ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de forma puntual, del mismo modo se siente muy tranquila y respaldada por los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, utilizará para refaccionar algunas cosas de su lavadero, además de realizar algunos arreglos en su mototaxi y comprar algunos lubricantes y aceites para continuar con sus ventas.
texts.en:
Melita, 42 years old, is a determined, enterprising, and hardworking woman. She is a single mother with a 14-year-old son who depends on her for his food and  education. Melita works hard every day to be able to give him a better quality of life. She lives in her own house, together with her siblings and father. Melita works primarily transporting passengers on her motorcycle. She gets up very early to drive her mototaxi through the city streets in search of people who need transportation from one place to another. She has dedicated herself to this work for 16 years, which has allowed her to pay to feed her son and send him to school, as well as advance financially. Melita also has a car wash installed in her house and she complements this with the sale of different lubricants, motor accessories, and motortaxis.

Fortunately, her financial earnings keep growing, giving her the peace of mind she needs in order to continue working day after day. She works with the help of her brother and her father. What she likes about her job is that she can organize her time in her own way. She does not have a fixed work schedule, so, in this way, she can devote herself to all of her activities and ensure they run smoothly. So far, everything is going well for Melita and she hopes to continue that way until she must take on other responsibilities. 

This is Melita's eleventh loan, so she thanks everyone who helps make it possible for her to access this financing. With it, she she will feel safer about advancing her business. On the other hand, she promises to punctually make all of her payments and, in this way, be assured and supported by the other members of her communal bank. Melita requests a total of 1500 soles that she will use to refurbish some parts of her car wash, to make some repairs to her motortaxi, and to buy some lubricants and oils to sell.

loans.use: air condition her car wash and buy motor lubricants and oils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance of computers in his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Joel

texts.en: Joel is a farmer in Ndunyu Njeru town and has been in the farming business for the past five years. He is 53 years old, married to Mary, and they have three children in school. This is his fourth loan term with KADET LTD, and he plans to use the amount to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting in his farm. With the anticipated profits, he plans to pay school fees for his children. Joel hopes to grow his farming business, make more income and thereby provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting in his farm

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es: Rosa tiene 55 años de estado civil viuda, tiene 2 hijo, ella cuenta que todo comenzó hace 15 años cuando Rosa vendió un carro que era de ella. De ahí compro artesanía para vendérsela a los turistas que llegaban hasta su casa ahí Rosa tenía una pequeña vitrina donde mostraba sus artesanía. Pero eso le fue muy bien a ella que llego a tener su propio espacio de venta de artesanía en un modulo del malecón de playas.Con el préstamo ella ampliara la variedad de su negocio pues comprara cosas como: artesanías, camisas, zapatillas
texts.en: Rosa, 55, is a a widow with 2 children.  She says that she started her business 15 years ago after selling a "carro" [not sure--a push cart?] that she owned.  She used the money that she got for the carro to buy merchandise that she resold to passing tourists.  She then bought a case for displaying her merchandise and did so well that she was able to set up a shop on the beach where she operates her business now.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to stock her business with the products--crafts, clothing, footwear, etc.--that she sells.

loans.use: to stock her crafts business.

loans.name: Sai's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural area of the Thmor Koul District in Battambang Province, Cambodia, Sai is 48 years old and married. She has five children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in school. She and her husband have struggled to feed their children by growing rice. Having engaged in this business for several years, they are able to earn approximately 20,000 KHR per day, and they manage to save about 10,000 KHR each day after deducting daily expenses. Lacking capital to support the business is their main challenge.
Sai has been with VisionFund for six loan cycles, while the other group member has just joined VisionFund. The past loans, which Sai successfully repaid, have helped her to relieve her family’s burden. Now she is leading her group of two in applying for a loan. Sai will use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes her crop yield will be more profitable and productive so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Rosamira

texts.es:
Rosamira, de 45 años, es una mujer muy amable y emprendedora, esta casa hace varios años, es madre de cuatro hijos de 26, 23, 17 y 4 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos quienes aún dependen de ella y su esposo para su alimentación y educación. El trabajo de Rosamira consiste en la venta de abarrotes y bebidas, pues ella es dueña de una tienda muy concurrida que instaló en su casa y ahí ofrece diferentes tipos de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar huevos, aceite, leche y bebidas como gaseosas, jugos y cervezas. Vende Bebidas desde hace 16 años pero su tienda de abarrotes recién tiene 1 año.  Eventualmente vende comidas regionales y en todas sus actividades recibe siempre el apoyo de sus hijos que le ayudan en la atención a los clientes, en la compra de los productos o diversas actividades relacionadas con su trabajo.  Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que está a lado de sus hijos y puede estar permanentemente cuidándolos y supervisando sus actividades, por otra parte, gracias a que su bodega es muy visitada siempre tiene buenas ventas que se logra ver reflejada en sus ganancias diarias, espera seguir consolidando su negocio y progresar laboralmente. Este es el crédito número 6 con MFP, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su acceso a este financiamiento ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de forma puntual, del mismo modo se siente muy tranquila y respaldada por los integrantes de su banco comunal.
