Anzhelika sells grocery meals: frozen meat, chicken legs, and cutlets. Her shop is located in a convenient and successful place where many shoppers pass by. Anzhelika is always consistent in her payments and is never late. 

This time, Anzhelika needed a loan for the purchase of meat products.

loans.use: to buy meat products

loans.name: Joncha

texts.fr: joncha est un homme de 52 ans, père de famille de beaucoup d'enfants dont certains vont à l'école. Il a également à sa charge les petits fils. Il exerce une activité d'élévage (il achète les poussins, les élève ensuite revend) il fonctionne à merveille mais son capital n'est pas élévé alors, il est obligé à chaque fois d'attendre que le stock acheté pour élever grandisse, qu'il le vend avant de racheter de nouveaux poussins d'où la rupture de stock quotidienne qui cause l'insatisfaction de sa clientèle tout le temps. il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter en grande quantité des poussins et aussi la provende ce qui lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle déjà grandissante mais aussi de réaliser un plus gros profit. Le benéfice que lui apportera ce crédit l'aidera à agrandir son activité( augmenter le nombre de poussins) et aussi à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en:
Joncha is a 52-year-old man and father to a family of many children, of whom some go to school. He also takes care of his grandsons.

He works as a livestock breeder (he buys chickens, raises them, and then sells them). The business works well, but his capital is not high so he has to each time wait for his purchased stock to be raised and then sold, before he can buy new chickens. This interrupts his everyday stock and often causes customer dissatisfaction. 

He is asking for this loan to buy a large quantity of chickens and also chicken feed. This will allow him not only to satisfy his already growing customer base but also to earn a larger profit. Profits from this loan will help him to expand his business (increase the number of chickens) and also support the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy more chickens and feed

loans.name: Dzame

texts.en:
Dzame works providing transportation because she owns a motorcycle. She also runs a dry fish selling business. She attained this work thanks to her savings which has made her invest more in business. She has employed someone to operate the motorcycle.

Dzame is asking for a loan which will be used to repair the motorcycle, which has been causing her some problems in providing the service because it has several parts that need to be replaced. In addition, she will add stock of dry fish for sale. For Dzame, this loan will be of great benefit because it will make her work easier for her goal.

loans.use: to repair the motorcycle and add stock of dry fish for sale.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki, 40, is a divorced woman who lives with her five children. She makes her living making and selling a variety of dishes in a food stall. She has been in this business for a number of years and has established a good customer base. Her business is home-based.

Riziki is focused on her work, honest, and very responsible. She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will enable her to be successful. Her desire is to grow her business, but to do that she needs capital. That is why she is requesting a loan from Yehu which will allow her to buy wheat flour, sugar, meat, etc.. Riziki has good repayment references. She assures that she will be able to pay the debt and is certain that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, meat, etc.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.ru: Сергей имеет свою торговую точку на центральном рынке и продает покрывала, халаты, полотенца, спички, свечки, туалетную бумагу, лампочки. Удачное расположение торговой точки и хорошая проходимость покупателей создает достаточный покупательский спрос на товар. Сергей всегда выплачивает свои кредиты вовремя.  Этот кредит понадобился Сергею для увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en:
Sergey has a shop in the central market and sells blankets, robes, towels, matches, candles, toilet paper, and light bulbs. The convenient location of the shop and good foot traffic create sufficient demand for goods. 

Sergey always repays his loans on time. Sergey needed this loan to increase the range of his goods.

loans.use: to increase his range of products and attract more customers

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is 40 years old and lives with her life companion and their five children. She buys and sells clothing for women, men and children. Umazi offers a great variety of skirts, trousers, dresses, shirts, and other items. She has been in business for two years and has gained enough experience in making sales. Her business is located in a strategic area at the market. She has many customers who prefer to buy from her because her products are of high quality and she also provides good service.

Umazi is an active woman who is dedicated to her work. She is determined and always looking for ways to get ahead. Her greatest secret is her motivation to become successful. She is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of bales of clothes to offer a variety for her customers to choose.

loans.use: to purchase of bales of clothes

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en: Lydiah is 33 years old and is a very hardworking and responsible woman who has her own business. She lives with her life partner and her two children who are studying. Lydiah works selling fruits at the market. She sells fruits like mangoes, oranges, bananas, etc.. She would like to be able to increase her sales and thus receive greater profits, which would be of great help to her family. This is why she is requesting a loan with which she can buy larger quantities of a variety of fruits. She is doing all this in the hope of improving her sales and to earn the necessary money to improve her family's stability so that they have all that they need.

loans.use: to buy larger quantities of a variety of fruits.

loans.name: Priscilah

texts.en:
Priscilah is 24 years old. She is married to Isaac and together they have two children. She is a farmer and has been in the business for the past year.

This is her second loan term with KADET LTD. She paid her previous loan well and in good time. She will use the loan amount to pay school fees for her children.

She hopes to educate her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a woman of forty years, married to Ishmael, and the mother of three children. She operates a beauty salon in Kangemi and has been in this business for eleven years now. She gets a monthly income of forty thousand.

This will be her second loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy beauty products and hair products, like shampoo, body lotion, hair oil, etc. 

In the future she wants to diversify her business and start a wholesale beauty shop.

loans.use: to buy hair and beauty products, like shampoo

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en: Marjorie is a farmer from the community of San Miguel, Bohol. She is 21 years old and married to a farmer. They have three young children. She is working hard so that she can provide for her family’s needs, like milk and diapers. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, sprayer and pesticides. She hopes that with the help of the loan, she will be more productive in her farming and she will be able to have a good harvest. In the future, she plans to have a bigger farm to earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, sprayer and pesticides

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en: Corazon is 41 years old. She is married with three children, ages 6, 9 and 15. While she helps in supporting her children through farming rice, her husband is also engaged in fishing. Corazon is asking for a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy fertilizer for her farm, floaters, fishing net and weight leads. These will help so she can further assist her husband to catch more fish and be productive at his fishing. She hopes that she can continue doing her business for her children. In the future, she dreams to have more business so she can better provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, floaters, fishing net and weight leads

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina de 22 años, convive con el padre de su pequeño hijo de 5 años. Ellos viven en la casa de los padres de Cristina, y se ubica en un anexo rural y agrícola. Cristina es una joven alegre y trabajadora. Desde que tuvo su hijo y empezó a vivir con su esposo (5 años atrás), ella se dedica a la agricultura y actividades de costura. Pero manifiesta que la siembra le trae mayores satisfacciones. En terrenos que heredó de sus padres y suegros produce papas, arvejas, habas y flores de gladiolos. 
Al lado de su pareja trasladan toda la cosecha hasta los mercados, y cada vez que obtienen los ingresos, disponen el dinero inteligentemente, un porcentaje para los gastos diarios, otro para volver a invertir en el campo y otro para ahorrar. Las metas de Cristina se enfocan en la construcción de su casa propia. Por ahora continuará con las siembras, aprovechando las lluvias del mes. Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP, por eso se compromete en ser puntual con los pagos. Ella es la secretaria de su banco comunal “Virgen de Fátima” y es una socia muy carismática. Con los 1000 soles podrá adquirir 10 bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos para sus cultivos de papas que sembró hace 1 mes.
texts.en:
Cristina, age 22, lives with her small five year old son and his father.  They live in Cristina’s parents’ house in a small rural and agricultural community.  Cristina is a happy and hard-working young woman.  She has been farming and sewing since she had her son and began to live with her husband (five years ago).

However, she says that farming brings her greater satisfaction.  She produces potatoes, peas, beans, and gladiola flowers on the land that she inherited from her parents and her mother and father in-law.

Together, she and her husband move all of the harvest to the markets.  Every time they do this they get good income, which they use intelligently.  A percentage is for the daily expenses, part is to reinvest in the field, and another part is to save.  Cristina’s goals focus on the construction of her own house. For now she will continue with the crops, taking advantage of the rains this month.

This is her second loan with MFP, and she pledges to be punctual with her payments.  She is the secretary of her communal bank, “Virgen de Fátima”, and she is a very dynamic member.  With the 1,000 soles she will be able to get ten bags of organic fertilizer for her potato crops, which she planted a month ago.

loans.use: to buy ten bags of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru: Наталья торгует на центральном рынке. Она имеет свой киоск с сумками, кошельками, дорожными и походными сумками, женскими клатчами. У нее большой ассортимент товара. В этот раз Наталье кредит понадобился для поездки на оптовый рынок в город Харьков, чтоб закупить и привезти мужские и женские кошельки,  а так же женские сумки. Наталья ответственный клиент, всегда выплачивает свой кредит во время, она вежливая, заботливая мать, трудолюбивая хозяйка в доме.
texts.en:
Natalya sells in the central market. She has her own kiosk with bags, purses, traveler and traveling bags, and women's clutches. She has a wide range of goods. 

This time, Natalya needed a loan for a trip to the wholesale market in the city of Kharkov to buy and bring back men's and women's wallets as well as handbags. Natalya is a responsible customer and always pays her loan on time. She is a polite, caring mother, and a hardworking housewife at home.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's wallets and bags

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es: Elvia de 37 años, convive con su esposo, con quien tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 15 años. Esta familia vive en una casa propia ubicada en un anexo rural. Elvia es una señora cumplida con sus obligaciones. Con mucho esfuerzo construyó su hogar y del mismo modo adquirió terrenos propios donde produce papas de las variedades “Única” y “Yungay”, además siembra hortalizas como arvejas y habas, pero menciona que su prioridad son los tubérculos, por la buena calidad que obtiene en cada cosecha. Ella y su esposo trabajan juntos en el campo, pero cuando el trabajo es más pesado tienen que contratar más personal, y las labores se convierten en actividades solidarias en su comunidad. Todos se apoyan. Elvia tiene planeado sembrar papas en este mes, por ello solicita de su apoyo para adquirir fertilizantes orgánicos. Éste es su préstamo número 4 con MFP. Está contenta por la confianza que la entidad le tiene. Pertenece al banco comunal “Progreso Cayán” y le agradan sus socios, por ser amigos y familiares. Con el dinero podrá adquirir bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos como guano de corral y de granja para sus cultivos de papas.
texts.en:
37-year-old Elvia lives with her husband and the couple have two children who are 17 and 15 years old.  They live in their own home which is located in a small rural village.  Elvia is a woman who carries out her duties well.  She worked hard to build her own home and to acquire her own farmland where she grows 'única' and 'yungay' varieties of potato.  She also sows vegetables such as peas and beans but she says that her main crops are tubers because they are always good quality when she harvests them.

Elvia and her husband work together in the fields.  However, when the work is more physically demanding, they have to hire more workers and the people in the community all come together to work.  They all support each other.  Elvia plans to sow potatoes this month and so she is requesting your support to acquire some organic fertilizers.  This is Elvia's fourth loan from MFP and she is happy with the trust that the entity places in her.  She is a member of the 'Progreso Cayán' community bank and she likes the other members who are friends and family members.  Elvia will use her money to buy bags of organic fertilizers, such as guano from farmyard birds, for her potato crops.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizer such as guano from farmyard birds

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a 52-year-old woman from the municipality of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married with four children. Her eldest is 24 and the youngest is 14. Together with her husband, they have been rice farming for more than 10 years now. This is their very means of supporting their children. 

Esterlita is asking for a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and pesticides for their farm. She is hopeful that it will produce a better yield once these inputs are available on time. Esterlita's income goes towards educating her children and for her family's nutritious diet.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Abshira

texts.en:
Abshira is 48 years old. She is married to Adolo and together they have eight children. She hawks clothes and has been in the business for the past four years.

This is her second loan from KADET LTD. She paid her previous loan well and in good time. She will use the loan amount to buy more stock of clothes for resale in her business.

She hopes to build her own house in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is 38 years old.  He is married to Margaret and blessed with two children, aged 11 and five years, respectively.  He provides transport services through the motorbike business he has had for four years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. He also owns a grocery stall which is operated by his wife.  He wants to purchase more fruits, beans and vegetables to improve the grocery business and has requested a second loan of KES.50,000 .

The profit he makes from his businesses would contribute towards him buying another new motorbike for additional income. His dream is to one day purchase a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: To purchase more fruits, beans and vegetables.

loans.name: Chege

texts.en:
Chege is 49 years old. He is married to Catherine and together they have four school-going children. Chege is a farmer and has been in the business for the past 15 years.

This is his fourth loan KADET LTD. He will use the loan amount to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for use in his farm.

He hopes to be a prominent farmer in his area.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 29-year-old lady, married to Patrick and a mother of three. She operates a grocery store in Muguga in the outskirts of Kangemi. She has been in this business for three years now and gets a monthly income of 12,000 KES.

This will be her second loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy groceries like vegetables and fruits for sale. In the future, Mary wants to diversify her business and open a retail shop in the same area.

loans.use: To buy groceries like vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul used his previous loan amount to buy more stock of spices to sell in his business, and it was very profitable. This enabled him to provide for the needs of his family as well as to pay school fees for his children.

This is his second loan term from KADET LTD, and he plans to use the loan amount to buy more stock of spices, vegetables, and fruits for sale.These include garlic, pepper, arrowroot, spinach, lettuce, watermelon and French beans.

Paul hopes to invest more in his business, make more income, and open a grocery store.

loans.use: To buy spices, vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Manana

texts.en:
Manana is from Sagarejo district. She is 42 years old and lives with her husband and two sons (17 and 21 years old). Her youngest son goes to the local school. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they run a small dairy farm of 18 calves and several milk cows. Manana milks the cows every day and produces cheese products which are sold at the capital city supermarkets. Manana is a very hardworking woman, with a great experience in her work.

She requested a loan to purchase food for calves. With this credit, she will purchase hay, which will be used for feeding the cattle during the fall and winter seasons. Since the calves will be fed properly, Manana will be able to slaughter them and sell the meat at a good price. This will increase the income of the family. The increased income will be reinvested in family agricultural activities. Manana plans to purchase more livestock and increase her monthly income. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase food for calves

loans.name: Mwembe

texts.en: Mwembe is a 36-year-old married man who has been operating a cereal-selling business. He lives with his wife and four children in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mwembe has been an entrepreneur for the last four years, selling as retail to the neighborhood. He is a dedicated man who strives to provide for his family. He is requesting this loan to buy sacks of dry maize and beans to sell. This will help him meet the demands of his clients, which have increased over the past few weeks.

loans.use: to buy sacks of dry maize and beans to sell

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary, from Nakuru, is 39 years old, is married, and has a child who is 14 years old.

Mary has had a second-hand clothes business for the past five years. She has applied for her second loan from KADET LTD, to enable her buy more clothes to add to her stock for sale.  She hopes to buy a piece of land in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to add to her stock.

loans.name: Kelly

texts.en:
Kelly is 33 years old.  She is married to Joseph and together they have one child.  She operates a retail shop and has been in  the business for the past year. This will be her first loan with KADET LTD.  She will use the loan amount to stock her shop with sugar, rice, soaps and flour.

She hopes to have a financially stable family.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, soaps and maize flour .

loans.name: Salveri

texts.en:
Salveri, a 31-year-old married father of one, lives in Kasese, Uganda where for the past four years he has been operating a retail shop and also earning a salary as a teacher. Since his business is located on a busy street, he has guaranteed customers.

Through hard work, Salveri is determined to change his financial status and acquire more assets such as land and buildings, despite the challenges of a low salary and price fluctuations. He is now requesting a loan to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
Davis is 31 years old, widowed and has two children. He has been a dairy farmer for the past five years and makes a good income.

This will be his first term loan in KADET LTD. He will use the loan amount to purchase more cows, which will help him boost his business.

He hopes to be a leading farmer in his home area.

loans.use: to buy another dairy cow.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is from Nakuru, 45 years old, married and has four children between the ages of 12 and 18.

Patrick has been running a retail business for the past two years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to buy sugar, cooking oil and tea leaves to add to his stock for sale.

He hopes to buy a piece of land in the near future.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, tea leaves,sugar.

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is 27 years old and has a retail shop business in Nakuru town. She is married to Stephen and they have a six-month-old child.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD and she plans to use the amount to buy more stock of sugar, cooking fat, wheat flour and maize flour. She will use the generated income to buy more varieties of goods to sell in her business.

Purity hopes to grow her business, make more income and be able to provide for the needs of her family, as well as opening a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy more stock  of sugar, cooking fat, wheat flour and maize flour

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru: Торговая точка Елены находится на центральном рынке. Она торгует  постельным бельем, подушками, а также нижним бельем. Елена очень ответственная и трудолюбивая. Она делает выплаты по кредиту даже в самый плохой день торговли и всегда находится на торговом месте, 7 дней в неделю. В этот раз Елене кредит понадобился для закупки подушек и постельного белья.
texts.en:
Elena's shop is located in the central market. She sells linens, pillows, and underwear. Elena is very responsible and hardworking. She makes her loan payments, even on the worst day of trading, and can always be found at her business site, seven days a week. 

This time, Elena needed a loan to buy pillows and bed linens.

loans.use: to buy pillows and linens

loans.name: Diana

texts.ru:
Торговая точка Дианы расположена на центральном рынке. Она торгует женской и мужской одеждой, носками, колготами и штанами.

В этот раз Диане кредит понадобился для закупки осеннего вида товара и увеличения ассортимента. У Дианы очень удобно расположена торговая точка, что создает хороший покуательски спрос на этот вид товара.  Клиент всегда находиться на торговом месте и всегда вовремя выплачивает кредит.
texts.en:
Diana's shop is located in the central market. She sells women's and men's clothing, socks, tights, and pants.

This time, Diana needed a loan to purchase autumn goods and to increase her variety. Diana has a conveniently located shop that creates good demand for this type of product. She can always be found at the shop and always repays her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy fall goods and to increase her assortment

loans.name: Vasta

texts.en: Vasta is 50 years old, has seven children and lives in Kasese, Uganda. For 13 years, she has been running a bar business located in a taxi park. Her main customers are travelers. She hopes to build a permanent house, expand business and buy land despite challenges of inadequate capital and high taxes. She is a hardworking woman and determined to see all her children graduate with degrees.Vasta intends to use the money to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha used her previous loan amount to buy building materials for construction of her rental houses. It was profitable and she was able to pay off the loan on time.

This will be her second loan term with KADET LTD and she plans to use the amount to buy materials for renovating the rental houses and attract more tenants. These include materials for plastering the walls of the houses as well as painting the walls.

Martha hopes to grow her business, make more income and build more rental houses.

loans.use: to renovate rental houses.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is 37 years old.  An enterprising business lady, she is married to John, who is a business man. They are blessed with four children. She has been sewing pullovers for the past two years with a monthly income of KES 6,650, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her fourth loan term with KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Rachael will use the loan to buy threads and a sewing machine. With the anticipated profit, she will plough back into the business. 

Her dream is to educate her children up to university level and improve the family's living standard.

loans.use: to buy thread and a sewing machine

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, a farmer in the town of Ndunyu Njeru, is 37 years old and married to Cecilia. They have five children. He plants cash crops such as vegetables, maize, beans, and potatoes.

This is his fourth loan term from KADET LTD, and he plans to use the loan amount to buy farm inputs. These include fertilizers and seeds for planting. With the generated income, he will pay school fees for his children.

He plans to grow his farming business by planting more cash crops on a larger scale to make more income.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Massah

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Massah from Torkpoi town, in the southern area in Bo, Sierra Leone. She is married and has four children between the ages of 2 and 17 years. Her children are attending school.  Her husband was a teacher but he has retired from the teaching field.

Massah runs a local food stuff business. She sells palm oil, gari and pepper. She has been running this business for 12 years.  She works at the business 11 hours a day and 10 days per month.   She also works as a farmer to earn another source of income to support her family, She describes her main problem as a poor road network to the village where she brings her goods.

Massah has requested a loan of Le 1,000,000 in order to buy palm oil, gari, and pepper. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. In the future, she plans to open a big palm oil store. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy palm oil, gari, and pepper.

loans.name: Teresiah

texts.en:
Teresiah has a clothes-selling business in Nakuru town. She has been in the business for four years and it has been profitable. She is 50 years old and widowed with three children.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD and she plans to buy more stock of clothes to sell. She also plans to expand her business premises so as to have enough space to stock more clothes. She will use the generated income to buy more varieties of clothes to sell.

In the future, Teresiah hopes to become a supplier of new clothes, hence make more income and be able to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Herme Camilo

texts.es: Herme tiene 39 años estado civil casado, tiene 2 hijos  Empezó hace 15 años en el empleo de servicio mecánico. El trabaja desde las 7:00am hasta 9:00pm con ayuda de los empleados. El sueño de Herme es tener un local propio  y también poder vender repuesto. Con el préstamo el comprara: herramientas y repuestos
texts.en: Herme is 39 years old, is married and has two children. He started offering mechanical services 15 years ago. He works from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm with the help of employees. Herme's dream is to have his own premises and also to sell spare parts. With the loan he will buy tools and spare parts.

loans.use: to purchase tools and spare parts.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina tiene 56 años, está casada con Gabriel de 61 años. Ellos dos viven juntos en una casa propia que construyeron con esfuerzo en un anexo rural. Marina es una mujer hacendosa y trabajadora. Gracias a los suelos fértiles de su ciudad natal puede desenvolverse con éxito en su actividad: la agricultura. Ahora se dedica al cultivo de papa, olluco, maíz y arveja, productos que le han brindado los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia. Todo lo cosechado, lo vende en el mercado mayorista de Tarma, que es donde mejores precios obtiene por sus productos. Son como 40 años los que lleva en el campo, y comenta que le va bien y que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta el mercado mayorista, ya que la movilidad es escasa por su zona. Con el tiempo, desea comprar nuevas tierras, con el fin de incrementar su producción, pero por ahora se esmerará en el cultivo de arvejas y papas que quiere sembrar este mes, por eso solicita de se ayuda para lograr este fin. Éste es su préstamo número 4 con MFP. Se compromete de pagar con puntualidad las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen de Fátima”, donde sus socios son personas activas y participativas. Con los 3000 soles del crédito piensa adquirir bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos y 3 bolsas de semillas de arvejas.
texts.en:
Marina, age 56, is married to 61 year old Gabriel.  They live together in their own house, which they built, with great effort, in a small rural community.  Marina is a diligent and hard-working woman.

Thanks to her native city’s fertile land, she is able to successfully develop her business activity, farming.  She now grows potatoes, ‘olluco’ [a type of Peruvian tuber], corn, and peas.  These products have given her the income needed to support her family.

She sells everything that she harvests at the wholesale market in Tarma.  That is where she gets the best prices for her products.  She has been working in the fields for 40 years, and she says that it is going well for her.  She says that the most difficult part is transporting the products to the wholesale market because means of transportation are scarce in her area.

In time she wishes to buy new land in order to increase her production.  However, for now she will do her best with the pea and potato crops that she wants to plant this month.  That is why she is requesting help to achieve this end.

This is her fourth loan with MFP.  She pledges to make her monthly payments punctually.  She belongs to the “Virgen de Fátima” communal bank, where the members are active participants.  She plans to use the requested 3,000 soles to get bags of organic fertilizer and three bags of pea seeds.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizer and three bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru: Александр торгует головными уборами. У него есть магазин "Lovins", а также торговая точка на рынке. Также он продает шарфы и очки.  Александру кредит понадобился для закупки осеннего отвара - осенних и зимних шапок, кепок. Александр добропорядочный, трудолюбивый и вежливый. Его магазин удачно расположен на центральном рынке, где каждый день проходит много людей. Кредит поможет Александру расширить ассортимент товара и привлечь больше покупателей.
texts.en:
Aleksandr sells hats. He has a store ""Lovins", and a kiosk in the market. He also sells scarves and sunglasses. Aleksandr needed a loan for the purchase of a collection of fall goods: autumn and winter hats and caps. Aleksandr is respectable, hardworking, and polite. His shop is conveniently located in the central market, where every day there are many people. 

The loan will allow Aleksandr to expand the range of his goods and to attract more buyers.

loans.use: to buy fall and winter hats and caps

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice sells fruit in Nakuru town and the business has been profitable. She is 36 years old and is a single mother of three children.

This will be her first loan term from KADET LTD and she plans to use the amount to buy more assorted fruit to sell in her business. These include oranges, mangoes, pineapples as well as watermelons, which are in high demand. She anticipates to make more profits which she will use to buy more varieties of fruit to sell in her business.

Alice hopes to grow her business by supplying fruits to various markets in and out of Nakuru town to make more income.

loans.use: to buy more assorted fruits to sell.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet 33-year-old Kadiatu from Torkpoi town the southern area in Freetown.  She is married woman and has one child who is 15 years old. Her child is currently attending school. In 2003, Kadiatu established her palm oil business. She began her business because she was a housewife and her husband is a bike rider.  His income is not enough to support the home. She works at the business 10 hours a day and seven days per week.  She says that the main challenge to her business is low purchasing power of customers.  

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to buy more gallons of palm oil. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. In the future, Kadiatu plans to open a palm oil store and expand her business more.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more gallons of palm oil.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en: Jackson is a thirty-one-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling fish for three years. He started as a vendor but now has an established market stall in town. His dreams are to educate his children  up to the university and and buy refrigerators so as to preserve fish for a longer period despite challenges of  price fluctuation and stringent rules by the authorities. Jackson intends to use the loan facility to buy fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en: Pauline is a thirty-eight-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been running a retail shop for two years  and has rentals as additional income source. After he had three children, he realised that the rent he was collecting from tenants would not substantively support the family so he set up a retail shop. His dreams are  to educate his children and expand his business to new areas despite challenges of stiff competition and inflation. Pauline is requesting money to buy rice, sugar and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Derick

texts.en: Derick is a twenty-six-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. He has a number of businesses such as poultry raising, a video library a and  mechanic's and spare parts shop all located in town. He says that if he had enough money he would like to have over 2000 chicks, a modern garage and an entertainment centre. He has challenges of poultry diseases and high cost of feed. Derick intends to use the loan to buy poultry feed and more chicks.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed and more chicks.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
Irene tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo Roque, con quien tiene una hija de 29 años. Ella y Roque viven juntos en una casa propia construida de material rústico, en un distrito rural. Irene es una mujer de mucha fuerza y responsable. Sus actividades son varias, pero lo que le agrada realizar es cuidar sus cultivos. Ella siembra con frecuencia papas, arvejas y flores de gladiolos. Con mucho esfuerzo Irene ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas. Cuando llega la hora de la cosecha, Irene prepara todo un evento. Contrata más personal, cocina los alimentos, alista los animales para arar la tierra y para la carga. De esta manera consigue que sus frutos sean solicitados cuando los traslada hasta el mercado mayorista de Tarma. 
Lleva 30 años realizando esta actividad y piensa, más adelante, comprar nuevas tierras, para ampliar su producción. Por ahora iniciará una siembra de papas, para lo cual requiere de su apoyo. Éste es su crédito número 9 con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo también ahora. Le agrada el trabajo en equipo de su banco comunal “Dos de Mayo”.
Invertirá los 1500 soles del préstamo en la compra de fertilizantes orgánicos para sus cultivos de papas.
texts.en:
Irene is 48 years old and lives with her husband Roque.  The couple have a 29-year-old daughter.  Irene and Roque live together in their own home, which is built from rudimentary building materials, in a rural district.  Irene is a very strong and responsible woman.  She carries out a number of different tasks but what she most enjoys doing is caring for her crops.  She sows potatoes, peas and gladioli frequently.  With a lot of effort, she has managed to work her land and make it very productive.  At harvest time, she prepares a whole event.  She hires more workers, cooks their food and gets the animals ready to plow the land and carry materials.  In this way, she ensures that her crops are in demand when she takes them to the wholesale market in Tarma.

Irene has been in this business for 30 years and she plans, in the future, to buy more land and expand her growing area.  For now, she will start sowing her potatoes and she needs your support for this.

This is Irene's 9th loan from MFP.  She has been very punctual in making repayments on her previous loans and hopes to continue doing so.  She enjoys the teamwork of her community bank 'Dos de Mayo'.  Irene will invest the 1,500 soles from her loan in buying organic fertilizers for her potato crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers for her potato crops

loans.name: Viloyat

texts.ru: Вилояту 19 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Доход ее родителей не хватает для обеспечения семьи с хорошей условий жизни. Вилоят решила помочь родителям для благо получения. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Viloyat is 19 years old. She is not married and lives with her parents. Her parents' income is not enough to provide the family with a good living environment. Viloyat decided to help her parents to get the benefit. To that end, she took the course "Bring It On", organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. 

She wants to start a business sewing women's clothing, because she has experience in this type of work. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 Somoni to buy a sewing machine, in order to establish a new business. She is awaiting your kindess.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Diloromkhon

texts.ru: Дилоромхону 20 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Дилоромхон студентка 3 курса Медицинского колледжа. Она очень умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Учиться на отлично и активно участвует во всех мероприятиях колледжа. Муж Дилоромхона простой рабочий и он не в состоянии оплатить за учебу своей жены. Дилоромхон обратилась в Имон Интернешенл с целью получения займа для оплаты учебы в колледже. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Diloromkhon is 20 years old. She is married and is raising one infant. 

Diloromkhon is a student in the third course of Medical college. She is a very clever and hardworking woman. To learn to perfection, she actively participates in all activities of the college. Diloromkhon's husband is an ordinary worker and he is not able to pay his wife's tuition. 

Diloromkhon has appealed to IMON International in order to get a loan to pay for college. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To pay her tuition

loans.name: Pacanquim Group

texts.es:
El señor Lauro esta casado, tiene 54 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, tiene 5 hijos, de los cuales ninguno estudia, se dedica al comercio y a la crianza de animales, inicio este negocio con la crianza de pollo de engorde, y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Organiza un grupo y solicitan préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de cerdos para crianza y cuando sean grandes, venderlos a un mejor precio, en el futuro espera contar con una gran ja de animales domésticos. Los demás integrantes se dedican a la crianza de animales, amarrada de hilos, y atención a una tienda.
texts.en:
Lauro is 54 years old, and he is married.  He has three years of an elementary school education.  He has five children, and none of them go to school.

He raises animals, a business he started by raising and fattening chickens.  So far he has ten years of experience.  His wife, who devotes herself to the household chores, helps him.  

He organized a group and requested a loan, which he will use to buy pigs to raise.  When they are big, he will sell them for a better price.  In the future he hopes to have a farm with domestic animals.

The other members raise animals, knot threads, and work in stores.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Barrett

texts.en:
Since its opening in May 2009, Rockwall Running Center, or RRC, has donated more than $45,000 to charities and eight schools in Rockwall, Texas. The center is owned by Coach Barrett who has raced for 29 consecutive years in 43 states and 6 countries. He’s trained more than 30 All-American athletes, and over the past eight years, helped the Rockwall community achieve what it thought were unachievable goals. 

One of those community members is Jim, who, along with several RRC members, helped Coach Barrett publish a book titled “RRC Baker’s Dozen (plus two) take on the NYC Marathon.” Jim wrote: “I’m a runner and I’m so glad that God used runners like Lee Chatham, Coach Barrett, Sonya Johnson and others to encourage me to join them on these group runs. It’s helped me learn firsthand about runners who go the extra mile to train…. But it has also allowed me the opportunity to see a group united in their care and concern for their fellow runners…” 

Coach Barrett’s training began in the 1980s when he was in college helping high school athletes, and by 1996, his work snowballed into a training club, which eventually expanded into a business. Coach Barrett, originally from North Carolina, participated there in organizing several community group runs. He moved to Rockwall eight years ago for work and started the first of now 10 daily running groups. Coach Barrett said he wanted to bring runners to one place and gain identity with the community--or as he calls it “action with passion.” He began a separate running team to run marathons nationwide, which expanded from three to 300 members.

Coach Barrett is also the Southwestern region’s association member of the Masters, Men’s, and Women’s Long Distance Running Committees of the USA Track & Field, the national governing body for track and field in the U.S. He said RRC offers training to get people off their couches and running a 5K, or 3.1 miles.

His Accion Texas Inc. loan will help his business be competitive, he said, as he’ll use it to purchase nutritional snacks, first aid items and name-brand running shoes to sell at the center’s store. Other major businesses already have a large inventory to offer their clients. As a small entity, Coach Barrett could not compete; the loan gave him an opportunity to build a better inventory for his clients, he said. The loan helped sustain eight RRC jobs, as well.  Without Accion’s help, Coach Barrett said, “We would have to close shop.”

Continuing to stay community-focused, Coach Barrett said RRC already has booked 20 events between January and June 2013. He expects that number to increase.  View their calendar and learn more about Coach Barrett and RRC on his website: http://www.rockwallrunningcenter.com; Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Rockwall-Running-Center/95029254593; or on Twitter: http://twitter.com/hoppeb01.

loans.use: To purchase nutritional snacks, first aid items and name-brand running shoes.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
Armando de 41 años convive con Erlinda con quien tiene 2 hijos de 18 y 10 años. Esta familia vive en una casa propia ubicada en un anexo rural. Armando es un hombre de coraje. Su carácter amable le ayuda mucho para realizar sus ventas. Él se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de sus productos. Siembra papas, arvejas y maíz, en  terrenos de su propiedad y en otros que arrienda.
“Cuando el cultivo es constante, los frutos crecen más fuertes”, menciona. Por eso se encarga de limpiar sus sembríos de la maleza, además de fertilizar sus tierras con abonos orgánicos y son el riego periódico. Él confía que las siembras de este mes serán productivas aprovechando las primeras lluvias del año.
Armando sembró 20 sacos de semillas de papas hace 1 mes, y le urge adquirir las bolsas de fertilizantes, por eso requiere de su ayuda. Éste es su préstamo número 7 con MFP. Se compromete en pagar con puntualidad las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “Dos de mayo” y le agrada el trabajo en equipo.
Invertirá los 2500 soles solicitados en la compra de varias bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos como guano de corral para sus recientes cultivos de papas.
texts.en:
Armando, 41, lives with Erlinda and they have 2 children, aged 18 and 10. They own their own house located in a rural area. Armando is a man of courage. His likeable character helps him realize his sales. He is a farmer and sells his produce. He sows potatoes, peas and corn in land that he owns and other land that he rents.
“When the crop is constant, the vegetables grow stronger”, he mentions. That’s why he removes weeds from his fields and fertilizes them with organic manure and periodic watering. He believes this month’s sowing time will be productive, as they’ll take advantage of the first rain of the year. 
A month ago, Armando sowed 20 bags of potato seeds and now urgently needs to acquire fertilizer. That’s why he needs your help. This is his 7th loan with MFP. He promises to pay the monthly quotas on time. He’s part of the Communal Bank “Dos de Mayo” and he enjoys teamwork.
He’ll invest the loan of 2500 soles into buying many bags of organic fertilizer, like farm manure for his recent potato crop.

loans.use: buy bags of organic fertilizer for his recent potato crops.

loans.name: Mary H.

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Mary H. She is married and has one child who is age 18 and at the college level. She has one additional dependent, a friend's daughter who lives with her for a better education. In 2000, Mary H. established her beauty salon business. She began her business because she was given away in an early marriage, as her supposed husband was a wealthy businessman. Her parents saw it as a means of survival for her to get married to him. When she got married, her aunt advised her to learn the hairdressing trade, which she did, and now she owns a shop. Working 6 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about 541,000 SLL every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Mary H. requires a loan in order to purchase hair attachments:
  • Charming Hair - 2 dozen @ 360,000 SLL
  • Expression Braiding Hair - 10 dozen @ 150,000 SLL
  • Afro Kinking - 2 dozen @ 260,000 SLL
  • Hair Glue - 4 dozen @ 60,000 SLL
The balance, 20,000 SLL, will be used for her transportation costs. In the future, Mary H. plans to establish a modernized beauty parlor and boutique. The loan will help as it is a means of generating income. Competition is her main problem; she needs more capital to be at the top. She is hardworking. The loans she will acquire will help in expanding her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase Hair Attachments - Charming Hair - 2 dozen @ Le360,000, Expression Braiding Hair - 10 dozens @ LeLe150,000, Afro Kinking - 2 dozen @ Le260,000, Hair Glue - 4 dozen @ Le60,000, the balance Le20,000 will be added to her transport cost.

loans.name: Vergelio

texts.en:
Mr. Vergelio is married with three children. Mr. Vergelio is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Mr. Vergelio is a farmer and grows  papayas to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years. He requested a loan amount of 7,000 PHP to buy papaya seedlings for the papaya farm. 

Mr. Vergelio has been a member of PMPC just since this year. In the future, Mr. Vergelio hopes to improve his family's living conditions by using the profits of the papaya farm.

loans.use: to buy papaya seedlings for the papaya farm

loans.name: Marifat

texts.ru: Марифату 32 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж работает в организации, а она сама уже 5 лет работает в МЗО Имон Интернешенл. Она является одной из успешных работников. У нее очень хорошие и умные дети. Ее младшая дочь учиться в частной школе. Зарплата Марифата и ее мужа не хватает оплатить за учебы дочери. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы дочери в школе. Марифат и ее дочь ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Marifat is 32 years old. She is married and is raising two children. Her husband works in an organization, and she has five years of experience working in MLO IMON International. She is one of the most successful employees. She has very good and smart kids. Her younger daughter is studying at a private school. The salary of Marifat and her husband is not enough to pay for their daughter's studies. She is asking for a loan to cover her daughter's tuition. Marifat and her daughter are awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter’s education

loans.name: Susana Paola

texts.es: Susana tiene 35 años de edad estado civil soltera tiene 1 hija, ella nos cuenta que comenzó ya hace 4 años ella vende productos naturales. Ella nos cuenta que resulto muy duro para ella por le daba mucha vergüenza por solo comenzó vendiendo a sus familiares pero ya ahora no porque le vende a sus amigos, vecinos. Con el préstamo ella quiere comprar: complejo B, multi 7 y mucho más remedios naturales etc.
texts.en: Susana is 35 years old, single, and has one daughter.  She says that she began selling natural products four years ago.  She says that it was very hard for her and she was very embarrassed so she began by only selling to her family, but now that is not so because she sells to friends and neighbors.  With the loan she wants to buy B-Complex vitamins, Multi-7 supplements, and many other natural remedies.

loans.use: to buy B-Complex vitamins, Multi 7 supplements, and many other natural remedies.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Meet 45-year-old Martha from Torkpoi town, southern area in Bo, Sierra Leone.  She is a married mother of one child, age 24 years. Her only child is in university, and she has three relatives at home.  In 2004, Martha established her table stand business. She began her business because she needs to generate income to support her child's studies. She works at the business six days per week. Martha says her business has grown and more customers are coming. She describes herself as a hardworking woman, and the whole environment knows about her petty trading business.     

Martha requires a loan in order to buy more garden eggs, peppers, onions, and vegetable oil. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to pay her installments and completely pay for her child's education. In the future, Martha plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more garden eggs, peppers, onions, and vegetable oil.

loans.name: Nosirdjon

texts.ru: Носирджон получает у нас кредит для покупки скота.    В его хозяйстве находятся корова и два бычка.   Также Носирджон работает  мастером в строительной компании.    Его жена работает поваром  в детском саду, она воспитывает троих детей.    На следующий год, на свои сбережения он планирует начать стройку дома, достроить еще две комнаты, так как его дети растут и три комнаты маловато для его семьи.    Но что бы начать строительство нужны большие деньги.   Он планирует на полученный кредит купить еще пару коров и когда те подрастут продать по выгодной цене.    Тогда он сможет начать своё строительство. Он благодарен, что существуют такие организации на которые можно положиться.
texts.en:
Nosirdjon is getting a loan from us for the purchase of cattle. On his farm, he has a cow and two bulls. Nosirdjon also works as a foreman at a construction company. His wife works as a cook in a kindergarten. They have three children. 

Next year, he plans to use his assets to start construction on his home and to complete two more rooms. As his children grow, three rooms is too small for the family. But a lot of money would be needed to start construction. He plans to use the loan to buy another couple of cows and, when they grow up, to sell them at the best price. At that point, he will be able to start his construction. 

He is grateful that there are organizations that one can be relied upon.

loans.use: to buy some cows

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone!  This is 32 -year-old Isatu from Torkpoi town, southern area in Bo. She is married and has children between the ages of 6 and 14 years.  Two of her children attend school. She began this business in order to provide a livelihood for her family.  

Isatu runs a rubber slippers business.  She sells rubber slippers, and shoes. She has been running this business for 10 years. She works at the business 10 hours per day and seven days a week. Her elder daughter usually helps her to run the business.   Her business is the only income she has.  Isatu says that her business is doing well. 

The purpose of this loan is to buy more rubber lippers and shoes. Her main goal is to educate her children and have a permanent business structure.   In the future, she plans to change her business from rubber slippers to leather shoes.  She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more rubber slippers and shoes

loans.name: 04.16.1 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Huyền has a retail business selling porcelain products (bowls, plates, cups). She is requesting a loan to purchase household commodities in general to resell.

Huyền is 50 years old and she is married with two children. Huyền is the group leader of the 04.16.1 Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent; another child is grown up.

This is Huyền's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Huyền has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Huyền faces in her business is the lack of capital.

 Huyền hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to build a new house with her business profit.

loans.use: to purchase porcelain products (bowls, plates, cups) for resale

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en:
Rugiatu is 40 years old and married.  She has four children, ages 4 to 20 years.  She runs a rubber slipper and shoe business at Torkpoi town, Southern area in Bo, Sierra Leone. Her children are currently attending school and she also has two relatives at home.

She's been in this business for 15 years and sells rubber slippers and shoes in a busy market area. Her business is the only income she has. At present, she faces a problem of price inflation and insufficient capital to run her business.  

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more rubber slippers and shoes. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her educate her children and increase her business.  Her dream and business goal is to have a permanent structure for her rubber slipper and shoe business. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more rubber slippers and shoes.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es:
Daysi tiene 30 años, es viuda y tiene 2 hijos; Angie de 15 y Cristopher de 5 años. Ellos viven en una casa propia que su fallecido esposo construyó en un anexo agrícola. Daysi es una mujer muy fuerte, hace un año su esposo sufrió un accidente y perdió la vida. Pese a ello esta mujer tomó las riendas de su familia y continuó trabajando. Ella se dedica a la agricultura. El gusta sembrar arvejas, papas, maíz y flor de gladiolos, porque al venderlos obtiene buenos ingresos. “Me conviene sembrar arvejas, porque el precio es mejor en estos meses”, dice orgullosa. Además de atender sus cultivos, se encarga de cuidar su hogar y a sus hijos, por eso distribuye bien su tiempo. Cuando llegan los días de cosechas debe contratar más personal. Asó optimiza su trabajo. Ella cuenta con una pequeña tienda de comestibles ubicada en su casa y desea mejorarla. Por ahora continuará con su trabajo en la siembra de arvejas. Éste es el préstamo número 10 con MFP. Esta muy contenta con el trabajo en su banco comunal “Virgen de Fátima”, porque aprende bastante y comparte sus experiencias en cuestiones de ahorro e inversión con los demás integrantes.
Invertirá el dinero en la compra de 2 bolsas de semillas de arvejas y varias bolsas de guano de corral.
texts.en:
Daysi is 30 years old, a widow, and has two children: 15-year-old Angie and 5-year-old Cristopher.  They live in their own home that her deceased husband built in an agricultural annex.  Daysi is a strong woman; it has been a year since her husband was in an accident and lost his life.  Despite this, she took the reins of her family and continues working.  She makes a living through agriculture.  She likes to grow peas, potatoes, corn, and gladiolus flowers because when she sells them she makes a good income.  "It is suitable for me to grow peas because the price is better in these months," she says proudly. 

In addition to tending to her crops, she is in charge of taking care of her home and her children, which is why she distributes her time well.  When the harvest days come she needs to hire more personnel.  This is how she optimizes her work.  She relies on a small grocery store located in her house and wishes to improve it.  For now she continues her work of planting peas.  This is her 10th loan with MFP.  She is very happy with the work in her communal bank, "Virgen de Fátima", because it allows her to learn enough and to share her experiences in questions of saving and investment with the other members.

She will use the money to buy two bags of pea seed and several bags of farmyard manure.

loans.use: to buy two bags of pea seed and several bags of farmyard manure.

loans.name: Comerciantes Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario COMERCIANTES está compuesta por Cuatro integrantes de los cuales tres son mujeres y un varón  que se dedican a distintas actividades, la coordinadora del grupo  la Sra. la Sra. Katerinne tiene 21 años,  con un  hijo que tiene la edad de 1 año,  la Sra. Katerinne  se dedica a la venta de aretes y artesanía en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en una zona muy concurrida de la ciudad de La paz  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Katerinne  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de artesanías y aretes por mayor para surtir su puesto, se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The COMERCIANTES group has four members (three women and one man) who all work in different businesses.  The group's coordinator is Katerinne.  Katerinne is 21 years old and has a 1-year-old son.  Her business is selling earrings and handicrafts from her sales location in a very busy area of the city of La Paz.  This is her first loan from the institution.  Katerinne will use her loan to buy handicrafts and earrings wholesale to stock her business.  She feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts and earrings wholesale

loans.name: Tagoykhon

texts.ru:
Тагойхон проживает в Яванском районе. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Двое его сыновей находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации. 
Тагойхон приобрел машину с целью заняться своим делом. Он намерен работать таксистом. Но для того чтобы начать свою деятельность ему необходимо установить оборудование для природного газа. Поэтому Тагойхон обратился за помощью в нашу организации. Он верит в то что есть люди которые его поддержат и помогут ему начать свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Tagoykhon lives in the Yavan region. He is 48 years old, married, and has five children. Two of his sons are away working in the Russian Federation.  

Tagoykhon acquired a car with the aim of engaging in his own business. He intends to be a taxi driver, but in order to start operations he needs to install equipment for natural gas. Therefore, Tagoykhon appealed to our organization for help. 

He believes that there are people who support him and help him to start his activities.

loans.use: To install equipment for natural gas

loans.name: Qurbonmurod

texts.ru:
Курбонмурод житель района Варзоб. Он 29 - летний молодой человек. Курбонмурод холост. Он живет с родителями и братьями. У Курбонмурода среднее образование. Он на протяжении пяти лет работает шафером. Курбонмурод предоставляет услугу по маршруту Варзоб-Душанбе. Кроме того он хорошо разбирается в авто. В свободное время он занимается ремонтом автомашин. 
Курбонмурод просит кредит для ремонта своей автомашины. Для этого ему необходимо приобрести новые запчасти.
texts.en:
Qurbonmurod is a resident of the Varzob region. He is a 29-year-old, young man. Qurbonmurod is single, and lives with his parents and brothers. Qurbonmurod has a secondary education. 

He has been working as a chauffeur for over five years. Qurbonmurod provides service on the Varzob-Dushanbe route. In addition, he is well versed in automobiles. In his spare time, he has been repairing cars. 

Qurbonmurod is requesting a loan for car repairs. To do this, he needs to purchase new parts.

loans.use: to repair his Gazelle motor vehicle

loans.name: Maria Jesus De Fatima

texts.es: María tiene 54 años estado civil soltero, no tiene hijos. Se compro una vitrina y perchas de allí ella vende laminas, cuadernos hasta artículos de bazar. Ella Atiende su pequeño negocio sola. Ya que comienza a trabajar desde las 8.00am hasta las 10.00pm. Ella cuenta que al principio su zona era de mucha delincuencia y no había mucha productividad para su negocio  pero poco a poco ha ido mejorando esas condiciones pues ahora le va muy bien  en su negocio y su sueño es ampliarlo más para poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus consumidores que dio a día le compran en su bazar. Y Ella cuenta que quisiera arreglar su vivienda y el sueño de ella es comprarse un carro. Con el préstamo quisiera comprar: artículos para el bazar, papeles, laminas,  etc.
texts.en: María is 54 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She bought a display case and stands and started selling laminated educational materials, composition books and other stationery products.  She serves alone in her store from 8.00am to 10.00pm.  She says that at first there was a lot of crime in her area and her business did not do very well but the conditions gradually improved and now her business is doing very well.  Her dream is to further expand her business so that she can meet the needs of the customers who come to her store every day.  She says that she would also like to fix up her home and her dream is to buy a car.  She will use this loan to buy stationery products, paper, laminated sheets, etc.

loans.use: to buy goods for her store (paper, laminated educational materials, etc.)

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen es una señora muy trabajadora quien siempre busca salir adelante con todos sus esfuerzos, ella vive junto a sus cuatro hijos quienes son el motor de sus deseos para ser mejor en la vida. María se dedica a la venta de ropa, sandalias, zapatos, y otros artículos. Su venta está ubicada sobre calle principal donde todas las personas  pueden observar sus ventas lo que es muy bueno ya que sus ventas son estables. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir su negocio comprando mayor variedad de jeans, sandalias de moda, diferentes colores y estampados de blusas para poder obtener más clientes y así aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
María del Carmen is a hardworking woman who is always looking for a way to get ahead through work opportunities.  She lives with her four children, who are the motivation behind her desire to improve her life.  

María makes a living selling clothing, sandals, shoes and other articles of clothing.  She sells on the main street, where everyone can see her selling. Her business is going very well since sales are steady.  She is asking for a loan to stock her business through the purchase of a greater variety of jeans, stylish sandals, colors and printed blouses in order to expand her clientele and thereby increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy clothing and sandals to sell.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La señora Luz Marina  tiene 28 años de edad. Vive en el municipio Chichigalpa, un lugar en el oeste de Nicaragua, conocido por su producción de caña de azúcar y licorera. Es uno de los lugares más caliente de Nicaragua.
La señora  Luz Marina  cuenta con un negocio de venta de verduras, Los fondos que se facilitaron en la institución CEPRODEL y Kiva fueron destinados para la compra de más cantidad de productos perecederos, los cuales los vende en su casa de habitación en la acera, la saca a las 6 de la mañana a las 6 de la tarde los 7 días de la semana.
El esposo de la señora Luz Marina, trabajo por 3 años en campo el corte de caña, él fue el cliente inicial de CEPRODEL, actualmente ella es beneficiaria de este programa de fondos de financiamiento.
La Señora Luz Marina se caso de nuevo. Tiene  3 hijos su primer hijo lo tubo a los 18 años de edad; dos de ellos del esposo que falleció;  Ella Actualmente estudia la secundaria, así como sus hijos se encuentran estudiando la primaria su sueño es seguir estudiando y graduarse con una carrera universitaria, como matemática o estudio social. Con esfuerzo propio y por beneficio que se le da con el crédito ella ha logrado mantener a sus hijos y sus estudios.
La Señora Luz Marina  manifestó que el los fondos que se dieron aumento los niveles de ventas en su negocio y que por ende aumento el ingreso familiar, dándoles una mejor calidad de vida a ella y a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is 28 years old, and lives in the municipality of Chichigapla, which is located in the western region of Nicaragua. This area is known for it's sugar cane and liquor production, and is one of the warmest regions in the country.

From a stand on the sidewalk outside her home, Luz Marina operates a business selling fruits and vegetables. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase perishable products to stock her business. She starts work at 6:00 in the morning, and works until 6:00 in the evening, seven days a week.

Before he passed away, Luz Marina's first husband worked for three years in the sugar cane fields, and was the first client of CEPRODEL, the organization from which Luz Marina is now receiving this loan. Luz Marina remarried after the death of her first husband, and she has three children. Her oldest son was born when Luz Marina was 18 years old, and two of her children are from her first marriage. 

Luz Marina is presently studying in secondary school along with her children, and is working toward achieving her dream of graduating with a university degree, perhaps in mathematics or social sciences. Through much hard work and effort, she has been able to balance providing for her children and working toward her educational goals.

Luz Marina has shown that she can leverage and wisely steward loan funds to increase sales and profits at her business, which also has led to improved quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase perishable products, such as fruits and vegetables, for her business.

loans.name: Elinita

texts.en:
Elinita lives in Silanga Tangub City. She is married with six children. 

Elinita has had a sari-sari store for one year. She requested a loan to expand her existing business. Elinita has been a member of PMPC for a year. 

In the future, Elinita hopes to build her business.

loans.use: to grow her sari-sari store

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 37 years old and lives in Lasam. She runs a little shop, where she repairs watches and other gadgets that she knows how to construct. Maribel started this business in 1990 and it serves as her source of funds for educating her six children. 

Now she needs some funds to buy repair materials, watch batteries, as well as new watches to sell in her shop. This will allow her to increase sales and get more income. A loan of PHP 10,000 will be a great help to her. She hopes to avail of the said amount to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy repair materials, watch batteries, and new watches to sell in her shop

loans.name: Nosirjon

texts.ru: Носирчон проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Носирчон предоставляет услугу, такси. Он пять лет как работает таксистом. Носирчон просит кредит для ремонта своей автомашины, чтобы продолжить свою деятельность, а также предоставить безопасную услугу. Кроме того он хочет провести капитальный ремонт в доме. Для этого ему необходимо приобрести стройматериалы.
texts.en:
Nosirjon lives in the town of Vahdat. He is 28 years old, married, and has two children. 

Nosirjon offers taxi services. He has worked as a taxi driver for five years. Nosirjon is requesting a loan to repair his car, in order to continue his activities and to provide safe service. 

In addition, he wants to overhaul his home. To do this, he needs to purchase building materials.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle and acquire building materials

loans.name: Faustino

texts.en:
Faustino and his family specialize in alpaca and wool weaves, from throws and tapestries to cushion covers and handbags. He would like to invest in the purchase of larger amounts of alpaca and wool to continue production. 

Faustino has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"My parents and grandparents were artisans. So I learned at an early age to weave on rustic looms, to prepare the warp and spin the wool. Our family motto has been: I will never let go of either my grandfather or grandson's hands, for what I have learned from the elders, I will teach to the young. Based on this family philosophy, our work today represents the art that has been passed down from generation to generation within my family."

"We would like to thank you very much for your support. With this microcredit we'll be able to stock up on alpaca, which is essential for our work. We believe you must be very special people indeed for supporting us this way - we'll always keep you in our hearts."

Use the link below to view Faustino's family's alpaca and wool weaves on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/artistdetail/index.cfm?faid=705

loans.use: to purchase larger amounts of alpaca and wool to continue production

loans.name: Epifanio

texts.es:
Epifanio de 42 años, convive con Elida con quien tiene 4 hijos. Esta familia vive en una casa propia construida por él mismo, y se ubica en un anexo agrícola.Epifanio es un hombre trabajador. Se dedica a la agricultura, y como buen hombre del campo sale todas las mañanas de su hogar con sus herramientas, aprovechando los primeros rayos de sol, para cultivar sus productos. Produce papas de las variedades “Yungay”, “Única” y “Canchán”, que son las más solicitadas y mejor pagadas por los compradores. Estos detalles lo sabe porque lleva como 24 años en la actividad.
Desde hace un mes ya empezó con las siembras, y como cuenta con parcelas en distintas y lejanas zonas, recién este mes culminará con lo que quedó pendiente. Ya cuenta con semillas de papas, puesto que en cada cosecha selecciona un porcentaje para emplearlas más adelante. 
Epifanio solicita de su apoyo, para adquirir bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos y concluir con sus siembras del año. Éste es su préstamo número 6 con MFP. Se compromete en pagar con puntualidad las cuotas mensuales. Le agrada el trabajo con su banco comunal “Dos de mayo”, porque los socios son responsables.
Invertirá los 2500 soles en la compra de varias bolsas de guano de corral y guano de isla, para sus cultivos de papas.
texts.en:
Epifanio, 42, lives with Elinda and they have 4 children. They live in their own house built by Epifanio, which is located in a farming area. Epifanio is a hard worker. He is a farmer and like a good man of the field, leaves his house every morning with his tools, to take advantage of the first rays of sunlight to cultivate his products. He sows potatoes of the “Yungay”, Única” and “Canchán” varieties; these are the most solicited potatoes by his buyers and go for the best price. He knows these details because he’s been a farmer for about 20 years.
For about a month now, he’s been sowing, but because he has parcels of land in different and far away areas, this month will end with him finishing the rest of the sowing. He already has potato seeds, as he selects a percentage from every harvest to use later.
Epifanio is requesting your support to buy bags of organic fertilizer and to conclude the year’s sowing. This is his 6th loan with MFP. He promises to pay his monthly quotas on time. He enjoys his work with the Communal Bank “Dos de Mayo” because his associates are responsible.
He’ll invest the 2500 soles in buying many bags of farm manure and island guano for his potato crops.

loans.use: buy many bags of farm manure and island guano for his potato crops.

loans.name: La Fuente Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento LA FUENTE está compuesta por ocho integrantes de los cuales siete son mujeres y un varón  que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. la Sra. Martha la primera en la lista, tiene 44 años, casada con un  hijo que tiene la edad de 5 años, la Sra. Martha  se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan,  empanadas y variedad de repostería, su panadería  que se encuentra ubicado  en la zona Santa Maria,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Martha  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de harina, manteca y azúcar por cantidad ya que tiene  un horno de mayor capacidad y quiere incrementar su producción y así satisfacer la demandada de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Venture bank LA FUENTE is composed of eight members, out of which seven are women and one is a man. They have different lines of work. The bank's president is Mrs. Martha, the first name in the list. She is 44 years old, she is married and has a 5-year-old son.

Mrs. Martha makes and sells bread, pasties, and different types of pastry. Her bakery is located in the Santa María area.

This loan is her second cycle in the institution. Mrs. Martha will use this loan to buy flour, vegetable shortening and sugar in bulk, because she has a higher capacity oven and she wants to increase her production and in this way satisfy her customers' demand.

loans.use: to buy flour, vegetable shortening and sugar.

loans.name: Las Carinositas Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LAS CARINOSITAS está  compuesto por ocho integrantes seis  mujeres y dos varones,   la presidenta del  banco es la Sra.  Julieta tiene 46 años, es casada tiene dos  hijos de las edades de 10 y 11 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona del Cruce Taquiña de la ciudad de Cochabamba ,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Julieta  va a usar este préstamo para la compra  de insumos como arroz, fideo y papa por mayor  para la elaboración de sus platillos  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de platillos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Julieta va  a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos y así mejorando sus ingresos, La Sra. Julieta es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a ella ya sus compañeras del grupo ya que en muchos casos son personas que sacan adelante solas a sus familias.
texts.en:
The “Las Cariñositas” (The Affectionate Ones) communal bank has 8 members; six woman and two men.  The bank president is Julieta, 46.  She’s married and has two children who are 10 and 11 years old.  She sells food in her sales stand located in the city of Cochabamba’s Cruce Taquiña zone.  

This loan is her second sequence in the institution and Julieta is going to use the loan to buy ingredients for her dishes like rice, noodles and potatoes  at wholesale in order to offer a variety of dishes to her customers.  Her reason for requesting the loan is to continue buying supplies and improving her income this way.  Julieta is a very hardworking woman who feels happy for the opportunity being given her and her fellow group members because often they are the people who are raising their families by themselves.

loans.use: to buy supplies like rice, noodles and potatoes.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio es un señor muy comprometido y responsable con su familia, él vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja como costurera y también con dos hijos menores de edad. Juan posee una carpintería en donde se dedica a la elaboración de muebles, roperos y todo lo que sus clientes le pidan, el es una persona que realiza su trabajo lo mejor posible por lo que las personas tienen mucha confianza en él. Juan solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de madera, pegamento, herramientas nuevas y todo lo necesario para realizar más pedidos lo que es muy positivo para la economía de su hogar, ya que les permitirá contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio is a very committed man who is devoted to his family.  He lives with his wife who works as a seamstress and with two minor children.  Juan has a carpentry shop where he works manufacturing furniture, armoires and anything else his customers request.  He’s a person who works the best way possible so people trust him very much.

Juan is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy larger amounts of lumber, glue, new tools and everything else necessary to fill more orders which is very positive for his family economy because it will lead to a better life.

loans.use: to buy lumber to make furniture with.

loans.name: Lidia Nohemy

texts.es: Lidia de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como vigilante en una empresa privada, y también vive junto a sus dos hijos menores de edad. Lidia trabaja muy duro comercializando cosméticos, perfumes, joyería y otros productos más los cuales ofrece de forma ambulante a sus clientes por medio de catálogos, siendo un negocio aceptable.
